quote: I don't believe that consciousness is generated by the brain. I believe that the brain is more of a reciever of consciousness.
author: Graham Hancock

quote: It’s all about reprogramming our minds to focus more on what brings us joy.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Mental slavery is a cheap & easy to find addiction. Knowledge stimulates mental faculties immune system.
author: Freedom Goodbird

quote: A man's best friend is his consciousness. In a nanosecond, his consciousness transforms him in what he wants to be.
author: Alan Maiccon

quote: A mystical symphony permeates my senses and a holy lullaby embraces me.
author: Earthschool Harmony

quote: Achieving higher levels of consciousness is the ultimate magic of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The only abyss that exists is the demonic sphere of consciousness created by the erroneous ideas and beliefs of the collective ego.
author: Carol Anthony

quote: Plants are not cognizant. When we cut a leaf, we assume that the plant is suffering. But that's our own anthropomorphism about what's going on.
author: Daniel Chamovitz

quote: Consciousness resides in the gap between electrons, protons, and neutrons.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It is not how many times we get lost, but how many times we seek the path, again and again, that determines our level of consciousness.
author: Vironika Tugaleva

quote: People will do anything, no matter how absurd, in order to avoid facing their own souls. One does not become enlightened by imagining figures of light, but by making the darkness conscious.
author: Carl Jung

quote: You're an infinite soul, a spark of Consciousness, and your perception is a creative decision you're continuously making.
author: Yol Swan

quote: The ‘wounded men’ may, I argue, represent a form of shamanistic suffering, ‘death’ and initiation that was closely associated with somatic hallucinati
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: ...I sense that stepping into the light is also a powerful metaphor for consciousness, for the birth of the knowing mind, for the simple and yet momentous coming of the sense of self into the world of the mental.
author: Antonio Damasio

quote: Now I have to say I'm a complete atheist, I have no religious views myself and no spiritual views, except very watered down humanistic spiritual views, and consciousness is just a fact of life, it's a natural fact of life.
author: David J. Chalmers

quote: Consciousness is the only home of which we know.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Negarse a que el acto delicado de girar el picaporte, ese acto por el cual todo podría transformarse, se cumpla con la fría eficacia de un reflejo cotidiano.
author: Julio Cortázar

quote: The degree to which your Consciousness expands, is the degree to which you understand yourself and the universe.
author: Gina Charles

quote: Ignorance is an illusion; we seek understanding. Compassion paves the way towards understanding and understanding paves the way towards acceptance.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: My consciousness is clean and new, And my conscience, clear and vivid. I know what I've been giving to you. But I don't know what you received.
author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quote: All work done with love is healing work.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Subject and object are not separate—so-called objective reality is projected by our subjective Consciousness.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: Truth in the human world, is constructed, defined and then reconstructed by the human self.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Meditation brings Nirvana, and Nirvana brings Buddhahood.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Order and reason, beauty and benevolence, are characteristics and conceptions which we find solely associated with the mind of man.
author: Karl Pearson

quote: The first two-dimensional images were thus not two-dimensional representations of three-dimensional things in the material world, as researchers have always assumed. Rather, they were ‘fixed’ mental images.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Life before consciousness was like blank paper, so be it.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: I tell you solemnly, that I have many times tried to become an insect. But I was not equal even to that. I swear, gentlemen, that to be too conscious is an illness- a real thorough-going illness.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: We cannot see the beauty of life with our eyes closed. Only when we cry with our eyes open can we begin to shed tears of joy.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: Why may we not be in the universe, as our dogs and cats are in our drawingrooms and libraries?
author: William James

quote: We are all either conditioned by belief system or consciousness. Belief system is built through the world, consciousness is built from within.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: It takes a certain level of consciousness to 'want' to grow your consciousness.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: Rethink Your Success Mindset: Gratitude is the attitude, fuel and catalyst that transforms life's challenges into wisdom.
author: Tony Dovale - ReThink Your Success Mindset tonydovalespeaks.com

quote: A radical transition to loving yourself often requires physical separation. It requires physical separation because you must relearn love beyond the physical body.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: The scariest part of ayahuasca, the thing that scares us the most, is that we might see ourselves.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: Certainly, the sensory deprivation afforded by the remote, silent and totally dark chambers, such as the Diverticule of the Felines in Lascaux and the Horse’s Tail in Altamira, induces altered states of consciousness.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Humans are not simply higher than Gods, Gods are mere mystical representations of the humans themselves.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Love is being able to view a situation without adding duality to it.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Not allowing the mind its freedom to think and find the purpose of life takes away the vision to focus.
author: Amitav Chowdhury

quote: Be formless. As long as your "I" is asserted, it will be an idol of worship
author: AainaA-Ridtz A R

quote: The now of this moment is nurtured by the space of nothingness. Here in this stillness is where the conscious garden grows.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: With my practical results, I proved the possibility of complete restoration of destroyed matter. - Unified System of Knowledge, 1996
author: Grigori Grabovoi

quote: To think is to split the subject and object, to feel is to merge them.
author: Mark Mandemaker

quote: What others do is none of your business;What you do is your wiseness.
author: A Billion things to do by Deeksha Arora

quote: There is no "I", there's only "we". Meaning all you can touch, and all that you see is a part of you, and a part of me.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: Life is like a luminous light; consciousness is that luminosity. If someone turns it off, there is only endless darkness, but the luminosity still remains in the universe.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: People experience conscious will when they interpret their own thought as the cause of their action.
author: Daniel Wagner

quote: Discover your level of consciousness. Now be silent and transcend and transform your consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Being in sync with life allows you to experience human activities naturally, as each unfolds, and not how the mind construes the experiences.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: The only path wide enough for us all is love.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Yes, it’s tough, it’s tough, that goes without saying. But isn’t waiting itself and longing a wonder, being played on by wind, sun, and shade?
author: Annie Dillard

quote: Wisdom may teach you that all places are one, but love shows you how to get there.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: The Beloved is Always There, Actively Seeking You.
author: Tony Samara

quote: ڕێگه‌ ناده‌م كه‌س پياسه‌ بكات له‌ناو مێشكم ، به‌قاچه‌ پيسه‌كانيه‌وه‌
author: Mahatma_Gandhi

quote: I'll see you in my dreams.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: Try as a meditation, to be with a stone, a flower or a tree, and you will find that they have consciousness. If you become friend with a tree, you will find that the tree will welcome you as a friend. The tree will be happy to see you.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Perfection is, however, not to be sought in the future, as we are fully capable of experiencing it here and now, if we abandon ourselves into the present moment and allow the pleasure of Existence take us with it.
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: There are two paths of which one may choose in the walk of life; one we are born with, and the one we consciously blaze. One is naturally true, while the other is a perceptive illusion. Choose wisely at each fork in the road.
author: T.F. Hodge

quote: I am a habitual rule-breaker
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: I am aware that my inner world creates my outer world and I choose to create a positive loving environment.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Awareness is a flashlight that gives us a choice.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: Keep your opinion to yourself unless it’s asked for.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: If you could see how I see by penetrating the superficial, you'd see the grand scheme of those co called "powerful" officials. It's disgust and deception at its deepest descent and yes, all those involved, it's hell where all reside.
author: Jose R. Coronado

quote: Awareness is not an idea about awareness, as it is not thought at all. Awareness allows you to feel life as it's happening, as it is in perception that consciousness and all spiritual qualities are manifest.
author: Belsebuub

quote: Be conscious of your actions daily
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The moment the light of your being becomes bright, darkness will melt away to reveal the brightness of your consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The spiritual work builds upon awareness, increases consciousness, transforms it, merges it with the divine, and this is how to reach true spirituality in life.
author: Belsebuub

quote: The future belongs to those who enhance their level of consciousness and awareness everyday.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We are all born as storytellers. Our inner voice tells the first story we ever hear.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Your judgments about another person say more about your own character than the character of the person you’re pointing a finger at.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: What soul is to to the body, common sense is to the mind.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Nothingness is the basis of everything that exists today. It's the mother of creation & consciousness!
author: Vishwanath S J

quote: If you want to find miracles, look at the mirror and you will find one. You are the miracle of consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Knowing what's ETERNAL will sustain you through the EPHEMERAL.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: Consciousness is naturally shamanic.
author: Joy Manne

quote: Listen to your body. The quality of your communication matters.
author: Natalie Geld

quote: When you don’t have explanation for a certain phenomenon, as a real human, you should suspend judgement, instead of concocting supernatural explanations out of ignorance and primordial fanaticism.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Whenever you are angry, take a beautiful object in your house and smash it to pieces. The pity you feel for what you have done is silly compared to what you are doing to your mind: taking a sacred moment to be alive and desecrating it by being angry.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Truth, independent of the Self, is irrelevant to the biological existence of human life.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: I always have my reasons, even when I don't know what they are.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: P60- one does not liberate people by alienating them. P62- consciousness is the constant unveiling of reality.
author: Paulo Freire

quote: Consciousness is a very simple phenomenon. Because we don’t understand it, we think it is a very complicated process.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: All beliefs are equally valid.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: I have been at war with parts of myself for so long
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: Don't be arrogant,Because there are a lot of people that still be better than you.
author: Rizky Adam Rifai

quote: Even though the world hails Joan of Arc as some sort of hero, which she undoubtedly was, what pains me the most is that her pathological condition ultimately led to her demise at the age of only nineteen.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Be conscious about life and time in order to maximize your time effectively
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: A veiled Mind is more enticing than all the nude men lining up the Seine, during Summer.
author: AainaA-Ridtz A R

quote: I feel that I am merely an agent, giving you some keys that have been given to me to pass on to you. These keys are to unlock doors out of your present prison. Doors opening onto new vistas. Doors beyond where you are now.
author: John C. Lilly

quote: Consciousness cannot be glimpsed as though it were something outside yourself, because it is you.
author: Belsebuub

quote: Freedom, if it emerges like magic from consciousness (like the conjuring of consciousness itself!) seems best recognized in the choices made for love.
author: Steven L Peck

quote: Living in the present moment is the recurring baptism of the soul, forever purifying every new day with a new you.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: A consciência da insonsciência da vida é o mais antigo imposto à inteligência.
author: Fernando Pessoa

quote: God is a sound frequency, and we can all tune in if we just listen. Some find The Rhythm through different melodies, but it's all music.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: I (God) am only a part of your own human consciousness, but a really bizarre part.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Dan explains the trip’s itinerary, which includes trekking through the jungle, boating down the Amazon River, and to my surprise, three Ayahuasca ceremonies.
author: Michael  Sanders

quote: The here and the beyond are enough, but there were a few angels for whom it was not enough: who demanded a third dimension--who sought fusions, communes, who ate each other and created sex.
author: Dale Pendell

quote: Human body is a hanging garden too. It hangs from the sky with feet touching the earth.The same way tree hangs from the earth with it’s leaves touching the sky.
author: Saroj Aryal

quote: Consciousness provides the fertile ground where seeds of greatness are born.
author: Gary  Gordon

quote: Kindness is the language of eternal consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Astray from a deep sleep chronic as I write by phonics, like insomnia I will always live the onyx night for revealing, and, upon it, still I'll steal the bright light of day right away just to keep building at speeds hypersonic.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Last night, I spoke to God.I told Him my plans. He started to cry.I thought I was great to move The Greatest to tears.He said that He was crying only becausemy plans were very differentthan His plans for me.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Is it a weakness not being able to hate? Or is it preparation for what is inevitable, the ability only to love.
author: Tom Althouse

quote: What you hate, you re-create; and what you bless, you put to rest.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: If Christ attained the state of Absolute Divinity, so can you. And once you do, then only you will understand the true meaning of Religion and God.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Remember:all the thoughts you have of yourself and others are written on your face. Make them kind.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Intelligence resides between us as much as it resides in us. And it resides within the subconscious much more than it does the conscious. We’re just conscious-biased: our conscious mind wants us to think it’s the be all and end all.
author: James Rozoff

quote: We are consciousness examining and expressing itself so that it can become increasingly aware of its infinite capacity for being and evolving.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: A reader cannot take poetry by expanding it beyond his/her consciousness, rather can take by shrinking it within.
author: Suman Pokhrel

quote: In each of us there is another whom we do not know.Carl Jungfound in David Eagleman's book: Incognito
author: David Eagleman

quote: Your soul understands more than you think.
author: Atom Tate

quote: San religion is built around belief in a tiered universe. As do other shamanistic peoples throughout the world, the San believe in a realm above and another below the surface of the world on which they live.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Humankind is united in its essential nature and is divided only in those things that are of secondary importance.
author: Wald Wassermann

quote: Learn to observe your emotions without needing to act or distract yourself from them. Within that stillness your truest most vulnerable thoughts will arise and it is these thoughts that will show you where your healing work must begin.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Be the celebrators, celebrate! Already there is too much—the flowers have bloomed, the birds are singing, the sun is there in the sky—celebrate it! You are breathing and you are alive and you have consciousness, celebrate it!
author: Osho

quote: Either your consciousness creates your own unique universe or other people’s thoughts will take over your world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Human mortality linked to the human ability consciously to choose how to act by exhibiting free will, humility, hard work, kindness, and compassion provide exemplary opportunities to learn and develop self-discipline.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quote: The practice is simple. Whatever you're doing, do that with total awareness.
author: Tony Samara

quote: Peace is conscious and active participation in your own life.
author: Mayra Porrata

quote: Within each of us is a light, awake, encoded in the fibers of our existence. Divine ecstasy is the totality of this marvelous creation experienced in the hearts of humanity
author: Tony Samara

quote: Consciousness ain't slower than a blink of an eye.
author: Toba Beta

quote: Sometimes you just have to turn off the lights, sit in the dark, and see what happens inside of you.
author: Adam Oakley

quote: When one loves knowingly, when one loves consciously, with full knowledge, with full understanding, the delights of a person in love are nothing in comparison with the delights of love that sprouts only from the spirit.
author: Judas Iscariot The Flight of the Feathered Serpent

quote: Death is a part of Life, they are dancing together the dance of infinity in front of the gates of Time. We can live our dreams as we are dreaming our future. Time is the Endless Consciousness
author: Grigoris Deoudis

quote: If you’ve come to see that the image you absorbed while growing up is not valid, and you launch out on a prefabricated Journey, you are most likely to simply replace it with another, fancier paradigm – the mind is that easily fooled by its own base view.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: A thousand years of tears can only be voluntarily avoided,
author: Donna Goddard

quote: Don't get too lost in consumerism or materialism. As for ownership, the ultimate test of it is were you born with it and can you take it with you when you leave?
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Waves of consciousness roll in, roll out, leave some writing, and just as quickly new waves roll in and erase it. I try to quickly read what's written there, but it's hard.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Self-realization or self-awareness is not a destination - it is a relentless experience - it is a psychological process of ceaseless evolution.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Even though it is common knowledge in our field of Neuroscience, I take immense pleasure every time I realize that our perception of the whole universe emerges from the activity of the little specks of jelly inside our skull.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Failures and mistakes are lessons to be learned from. They are opportunities for growth.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: How "spiritual" you are has nothing to do with what you believe, but everything to do with your state of consciousness.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Success = Dream x Plan x WorkConscious dreams are essential components of your success. When you are backed up by a convincing dream, meticulous planning, and 100% execution, you are bound to be victorius.
author: Vishwas Chavan

quote: There is no true reality. It is just an interplay of your consciousness, awareness, thoughts, and actions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you are fully conscious, drama does not come into your life anymore.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: You are what you consume, and as an organism and consciousness, you in fact become a commodity and predator yourself.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: One could not become two without the one that feeds, sustains and outlives the dance of two. Two are always formed of the one, which means that all duality is formed of Nonduality.
author: Georgi Y. Johnson

quote: Rethink Your Success Mindset: With the right mindset, everything that you experience, along your journey towards success, is a blessing.
author: Tony Dovale - ReThink Your Success Mindset tonydovalespeaks.com

quote: Yoga does not start or end on your mat, but is present in every breath you take.
author: Evita Ochel

quote: Practice bravery every day and the self-worth will come.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: When it comes to society and human consciousness, Darwinism still exists in its primal message.
author: Kat Lahr

quote: Give a man a mask, and he'll tell you deeper and darker truths. But he'll also be more abusive, unaccountable, and demonic.
author: Cory Duchesne

quote: Our consciousness and awareness, which includes our choices as to where we place our focus, alters the paths of our lives, and creates a split in reality, leading to the creation of two or more worlds at any moment in time.
author: Kevin Michel

quote: All wisdom contracts then expands, contracts then expands. That is how consciousness evolves.
author: S. Kelley Harrell

quote: Like imagination, consciousness has no limits.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Was it possible that Ranulph, too, was a real person, a person inside whose mind things happened? He had thought that he himself was the only real person in a field of human flowers. For Master Nathaniel that was a moment of surprise, triumph, tenderness, alarm.
author: Hope Mirrlees

quote: Throw away the doctrine of waiting for confirmation
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Thought is the only concept that creates the unknown. You have everything you need to know in this moment.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: Leave yourself alone, trying to fix your subconscious with programs and acts of will is tantamount to trying to start a car with a bird feather. You have the wrong tool, so please leave yourself alone.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: And then one day you realise that if you want to be rich, you'd have to give away almost everything you own.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The emergence of one world consciousness must be accompanied with one world political infrastructures.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Strange, how a moment of existence can cut so deeply into our being that while ages pass unnoticed, a brief love can structure and define the very topology of our consciousness ever after.
author: Steven L. Peck

quote: Consciousness was upon him before he could get out of the way.
author: Kingsley Amis

quote: There is a prison that holds us within it. It is a prison of the mind and yet not truly of the mind for it is an illusion. Lest we not forget that consciousness and not the mind is the true architect of our existence.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: To live without awareness is to live as the deaf, blind, and dumb in a world of vibrant light and sound.
author: Belsebuub

quote: Shift your consciousness to a higher consciousness to see the beauty and joy all around you. Immerse yourself in beauty and will see everyone will be eager to join you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When our focus is toward a principle of relatedness and oneness, and away from fragmentation and isolation, health ensues
author: Larry Dossey

quote: I don't trust anybody who isn't a little bit neurotic
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: Reality works in this fashion: what you hold in your mind – the self-image,hopes and expectations, world view, beliefs, fears, feelings and all else – becomes realized in your life, continuously.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: You can trust your gut instinct. Always.
author: Ana Ortega

quote: Individuality is but another act of segregation. We need instead learn the process of Individuation. One is to know thyself merely to be a single brick within the wall of mass creation and group consciousness.
author: Tyler Hebert

quote: Concentration in the job keeps quality in the work.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: „We are the embodiment of Life, we are born into this world as a result of a Miracle.
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: All throughout our lives, we selectively draw on selected shavings of life events and reflect upon them through consciousness, creating an arranged catalogue of senses, faculties, and mental activities that compose our personal life story.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quote: Control of consciousness determines the quality of life.
author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

quote: After the dinosaurs, it is us the humans that have become the dominant species on planet earth. However, unlike the dinosaurs, we have become the rulers of this planet not by ferociousness, but by intelligence, even though we are no less ferocious than them.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Ego means being afraid.
author: Maria Erving

quote: I swoon into a standing eight count. Goddamn, I actually feel my consciousness want to detach and hide like a turtle retreating into a hopelessly soft shell that won't save anyone.
author: Paul Tremblay

quote: For human, to be able to understand that he works efficiently, he has to do his private tasks through macro-salvation. - THE TEACHING OF GRIGORI GRABOVOI ABOUT GOD. THE DYNAMIC STRUCTURING OF THE SOUL, 2004
author: Grigori Grabovoi

quote: True Love is when you are able to see yourself in another, when you recognize that there is no separation between you and any other Being in the Universe.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: Everything is temporary but the power of Love is Infinite because it is the space, it is Everything.
author: Tony Samara

quote: Tune in to the perspective you have about your problem and you will uncover the life experiences that ingrained them. Bing light to each experience. Become conscious of outdated mindsets. Let go of those that no longer serve you.
author: Jackie Viramontez

quote: When your chair is positioned facing the wall, you see the wall. When it is positioned facing the sea, you see the sea. The same is true for us. Perspective is everything. Align with the divine.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: She was of another world; different. But by then, secretly, so was I.
author: Sarah Winman

quote: Come, let us learn just to love, just to understand, and just to gain a higher consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Without the Mind, there is no God. Without you, there is no God.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Witches are liberated from their own fears and limited thinking. In turn, their presence has the power to liberate and consciously expand others.
author: Dacha Avelin

quote: Hitting bottom is an inside job — it's something that happens within our consciousness.
author: Christopher Dines

quote: Cherish your existence, for memories become legacies and life can change in an instant.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: Truth is unoriginal.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: What is the point of a relationship if not to grant two people the very private privilege to uplift one another every day?
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: When you enter any relationship with doubt that doubt will be reflected back to you. You must trust yourself completely to attract another that can be trusted.
author: Shalom Melchizedek

quote: God is the soul of the universe.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: I know noble accentsAnd lucid, inescapable rhythms;But I know, too,That the blackbird is involvedIn what I know.
author: Wallace Stevens

quote: Consciousness is our gateway to experience: It enables us to recognize Van Gogh’s starry skies, be enraptured by Beethoven’s Fifth, and stand in awe of a snowcapped mountain. Yet consciousness is subjective, personal, and famously difficult to examine.
author: Daniel Bor

quote: Trust in God, for he has a plan for the universe, and you are an integral part of the plan.
author: Nozer Kanga

quote: Wisdom is a true activity of compassion. And so, meditation is the act of loving kindness. It is the activity where loving kindness is applied on all levels.
author: Tony Samara

quote: Life is beautiful if you accept what comes your way and do not try to resist it.
author: Nozer Kanga

quote: My conscious self lived within the familiar and sanctioned world, it denied the new world that dawned within me.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Communication is a wonderful thing.It is when we presume or do not ask what another person thinks or feels that creates the problems.
author: Hazel Butterworth

quote: We are the guardians of our beings.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: We cannot perceive what we are not vibrationally a part of. We cannot be affected by an experience of evil, when we are focused on peace, harmony and love.
author: Raphael Zernoff

quote: The universe wanted to be loved and appreciated so she gave you consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Creativity is the state of consciousness in which you enter into the treasury of your innermost being and bring the beauty into manifestation.” (p.232)
author: Torkom Saraydarian

quote: All that exists is the present moment
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Physical body is just an instrument, through which you experience life. You have the awareness field, along with the physical body to experience life, while the entire major functions of the physical body, is performed by the subtle strings of the soul.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: My Word is bind, stone set, no Rosetta.The stones progress a finished pyramid of hidden codes, messages, encryption, and ancient wisdom.
author: Jose R. Coronado

quote: If you are in a place where you wish to attract a partner you must be willing to stay true to who you are, the person you’ve become, in order to create the life and attract the partner who is truly for your highest unfolding and growth.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Light and flow is what shifts the world’s vibration, not the stagnation and resistance that comes with opposition.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: It’s not enough to just enter into a relationship with a person because you believe or they say that they love you. A person can’t just be in love with you, they have to be in love with your purpose also. And ultimately your purpose is growth.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: An individual only breaks his or her sexual practice when they don’t fully have knowledge of why they are doing it. When you have full knowledge there’s an inherent respect present and that respect won’t let you break a practice that’s in place to grow you.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Mind is the Alpha – Mind is the Omega.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Be conscious of the global elements in your dreams. When starting local, dream of taking it global sooner.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: We cam leave the rat race to rodents... but I suspect that even they wouldn't like it.
author: Adriano Bulla

quote: For the makers, the paintings and engravings were visions, not representations of visions.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Your life changes one thought at a time. And it’s the thought that we are separate from source, from love, that prevents us from being whole.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: When you are intense, you will do things persistently and with speed
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The instruments needed for the song of life are always there and will play the song that you wish to hear. You decide, through active participation, what will be heard.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: Find the joy in your everyday situations. You have the choice, you always did and you will always do. Thrive.
author: Ana Ortega

quote: To be prepared against surprise is to be trained. To be prepared for surprise is to be educated.
author: James P. Carse

quote: The more emotional you are in a situation, the more memories you’ll have of that situation in the long run.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: I am Sama Veda among the Vedas; I am Indra among the Devas; I am the mind among the senses; I am the consciousness in living beings.
author: Anonymous

quote: Life is a natural phenomenon – and by mystifying it, one only disgraces its natural beauty.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Authentic trust is choosing to trust the person you have chosen to be with, always aware that you both are growing and expanding.
author: Shalom Melchizedek

quote: The truth of who we are dissolves the illusions when they arise, simply by us not buying into them anymore. By realizing they were counterfeit bliss. By and by, oneness dissolves what was once separation.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: You want to become a better person?Just give thanks. Give thanks for all of it.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The process of awakening or enlightenment is nothing but to empty yourself from inside, and make you encounter with the real being, where you absolutely relax yourself and feel rejuvenated to experience life again.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: My whole consciousness underwent some change, a tissue in my brain parted.
author: Knut Hamsun

quote: Our universe was created to perpetuate creation, it was not created to perpetuate consumption.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: All knowledge that Science has acquired so far, has been through the concentration of the powers of the mind.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Have no fear. Trust in the vibrational currents of your life.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Can you give money a new set of conscious instructions so it can be our team mate? Imagine that, money on our team as we help the planet and people thrive.
author: Peta Kelly

quote: Neuron is to Consciousness, what D.N.A. is to Life. Thus, Biology of Mind is to the twenty-first century, what Biology of Life was to the twentieth century.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: It is your ego that needs to explain itself. The self just is.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Be aware of the type of humor you use in your daily life. Just because people are laughing doesn’t mean it is creating positive vibes.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Pathology can indeed cause experiences of the Kingdom of God, but not all God experiences are caused by pathology.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: It’s key to know if you’re currently having sex based on an ego connection or transcending your sex life into love.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: A man's shortcoming lies in the belief that he must always assert his manliness. A woman's shortcoming lies in the belief that she must always repress it.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: This universe is a dancing stage for consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Credulity is not a crime, but it becomes criminal by resisting conviction. It is strangling in the womb of the conscience the efforts it makes to ascertain the truth. We should never force belief upon ourselves in anything.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: You already know everything, all ayahuasca does is remind you, it makes you aware of the infinite you have already known.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: So the paradox goes: No man who is really ignorant is ever aware that he is ignorant. That is its finest, most faulty manifestation; there can be no true ignorance without first some claim of intelligence or consciousness, or superiority or enlightenment.
author: Criss Jami

quote: When you think you know Everything, you know NOTHING! When you think you know Nothing.. You become KRISHNA- THE UNKNOWN !
author: Yogini TrueKrishnaPriya

quote: Once human beings had developed higher-order consciousness, they had the ability to see mental images projected onto surfaces and to experience afterimages.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Various visionaries through time came to see with some degree of clarity that Oneness, that intrinsic connection between Self and experienced Reality.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: If only a world-wide consciousness could arise that all division and fission are due to the splitting of opposites in the psyche, then we should know where to begin.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: Science often progresses by carving out new distinctions that refine the fuzzy categories of natural language.
author: Stanislas Dehaene

quote: I can now simply say that consciousness can be stretched out of the body like a giant piece of chewing gum without the need to have any defined diameter or length of the connection with the body, by Jozef.
author: Jozef Simkovic

quote: I don´t listen to hoax or rumours, but I like a good sense of humour. If you are wrong, be wise, apologize. Otherwise, be kind and rewind. Gone with the wind...
author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quote: Partly it was a sort of hymn to the wisdom and majesty of Big Brother, but still more it was an act of self-hypnosis, a deliberate drowning of consciousness by means of rhythmic noise.
author: George Orwell

quote: Consciousness is a mystery that faces the mystery of potential and transforms it into actuality. We do that with every choice we make. Our choices determine the destiny of the world. By making a choice, you alter the structure of reality.
author: Jordan B. Peterson

quote: Find something beautiful to focus on daily and allow Inspiration to have its way with you.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Present continuously becomes past, and by the time we take stock of it we are in another present, consumed with planning the future, which we do on the stepping-stones of the past. The present is never here. We are hopelessly late for consciousness.
author: Antonio Damasio

quote: If all is Consciousness, experience its infinity, create your own journey through it, be amazed.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: When I first tried a sensory deprivation tank, people thought I had lost my mind. In fact, I had found it.
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: You're lucky. I'm always conscious of myself —in my mind. Painfully conscious.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Nature is sound in many forms and states of existence.
author: João Mendes

quote: I wasn't entirely awake, but I couldn't cross the line into sleep. 'Go. Go on. The abyss is right there. Just a few more steps.' But I was too tired to break through the glass.
author: Ottessa Moshfegh

quote: If life were a highway, I would still look for the footpath, for walking that, I would learn about us, enjoying the extra time to do so.
author: Tom Althouse

quote: A healthy PFC means a healthy cognitive grip over the world with very little elements of prejudice.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: He is: frog: unworried by the self-consciousness with which the human animal is stuck; it is our blessing and our curse; not only do we know, we know that we know. And we are not often willing to face how little we know.
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: We have been to the moon, we have charted the depths of the ocean and the heart of the atom, but we have a fear of looking inward to ourselves because we sense that is where all the contradictions flow together.
author: Terence McKenna

quote: Anger is an assertive reaction of the mind to unpleasant stimuli. To change it, open your flood gate of kindness and focus on your compassionate consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We’re naked under our clothes; we both know what it’s like to need to fart and hold it in, or not be able to get a hard-on, or worry that a bloke across the room might be looking at your bird and you might have to fight him but he looks well hard.
author: Russell Brand

quote: Things aren’t brought to light because of the illusion of fear and we don’t want to shatter the illusion because we can go on living within multiple realities, where we can unfairly hold someone to an expectation they are unaware of.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: No matter how strange things get, know that with every breath, you are becoming that which you have always been.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: I started to do some clearing and I was coming to understand the importance of my sexual energy, although my understanding at that time only went as far as understanding soul ties.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: What I want from you comrade, what the world wants from you, O dearest, are the neurons of steel, within which dwells a mind of the same material of which the thunderbolt is made.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Art doesn’t give rise to anything in us that isn’t already there. It simply stirs our curious consciousness and sparks a fire that illuminates who we have always wanted to be.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The spiritual path is more of an unlearning than a learning.
author: Donna Goddard

quote: Pure potentiality is a phrase that denotes that pure consciousness is the true essence that lies in us.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Don't believe everything you are told, if it resonates within you, then listen and act.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: Life wants you to be complete unto yourself, generally enjoy and expand consciousness, open, explore, love.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: Unconditional Love is the outer expression of Inner Peace.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Kakav smo to svijet napravili kad u njemu više ni neznalice ne mogu da budu srećne?
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quote: You will never experience the true self by using the mind in an attempt to find it.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: I am Not, but the Universe is my Self.
author: Shih-t'ou

quote: There can never be a conflict between science and religion, once you understand the spiritual knack of the human brain circuits.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: The life of your dreams begins with the unfolding of consciousness from within.
author: Jiulio Consiglio

quote: To read is to translate, for no two persons' experiences are the same. A bad reader is like a bad translator: he interprets literally when he ought to paraphrase and paraphrases when he ought to interpret literally.
author: Wystan Hugh Auden

quote: All of Nature follows perfectly geometric laws. The Ancient Egyptian, Greek, Peruvian, Mayan, and Chinese cultures were well aware of this, as Phi—known as the Golden Ratio or Golden Mean—was used in the constructions of their sculptures and architecture.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: When it comes to soul ties and relationship cords they are also actual living cords that are not visible in this realm but actually do exist.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Consciousness is like a light bulb. We can dim it or brighten it with the power of awareness, love, compassion, and kindness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There's little value in advancing technology if our consciousness, compassion, conversation and cooperation is regressing.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Any conscious or unconscious thought, love, or actions will bring more energy in your life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When consciousness meets consciousness, vitality is released.
author: Georgi Y. Johnson

quote: I can’t tell you what consciousness is, but I know I can only think when I am conscious.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Become a good noticer. Pay attention to the feelings, hunches, and intuitions that flood your life each day. If you do, you will see that premonitions are not rare, but a natural part of our lives.
author: Larry Dossey

quote: The key is not to drop or erase our past or our consciousness but to observe and understand it.
author: Pragya Tiwari

quote: Since the only constant is change, as you grow there is always room to develop and improve the personal relationship you have with yourself.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: It is only when you are firm in your knowingness that you will be ready to level up and attract someone who you can work in union with to grow beyond your constructs and blocks you may have towards love.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: The belief that myths are somehow less true than the symbolic dream we call 'reality' may be the greatest myth of all.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: I wanted to know the truth, and yet I was afraid of what I might learn.
author: Daniel Keyes

quote: Enlightenment lacks any form of judgment.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Breath is the bridge that connects us with the mysteries of the universe and universal consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We must each achieve greater individual consciousness and self-knowledge, and project mindful kindness toward everything and everyone.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: The populace think that your rejection of popular standards is a rejection of all standard, and mere antinomianism; and the bold sensualist will use the name of philosophy to gild his crimes. But the law of consciousness abides.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson Self Reliance

quote: There is no right person or wrong person. They only differ in the level of consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The only creative force capable of causally revising your experienced reality is your power to change your Self.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: We do not see things as they are, nor do we even see them as we are, but only as we believe our story to have been.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: The complex organic device that creates and thereafter drives consciousness, is the human brain. Consciousness evolved hand in hand with the evolution of the human brain throughout a time span of six million years.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: There's no consciousness without senses and memories.
author: Toba Beta

quote: Its strangeness is, we might say, due to its very reality, to the very fact that there is existence. The questioning of Being is an experience of Being in its strangeness
author: Emmanuel Levinas

quote: As you focus on something you desire, your intent collapses scalar waves of consciousness into 3D. Your DNA literally becomes your projector of reality.
author: Deborah Bravandt

quote: Learning how to transcend consciousness to a higher consciousness is a blissful journey and the ultimate essence of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: P46- As long as the oppressed remain unaware of the causes of their condition, they fatalistically "accept" their exploitation.
author: Paulo Freire

quote: There are infinite ways for your mind to torture it's self.
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quote: What goes on in our heads solely determines the level at which we function in society, our physical health, and the degree of our mental and emotional stability and maturity.
author: Renee Cefalu

quote: Sequential instructions give rise to logical experiences.
author: Joey Lawsin

quote: Everyone is operating and running their lives at their current level of conscious awareness.
author: Carlos Marin

quote: Know this: If you are afraid of starting over, it means you have not yet begun.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: The truth is, life grows and evolved inside of you and, it has nothing to do with any other person except you. The truth of life grows and evolves, in the form of understanding.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: Most of the time we think we are thinking; but actually we are wrestling between fundamental crisis of two things: consciousness and conditioning.
author: Aditya Ajmera

quote: The most important aspect of life is not the creation, but the creator in you and the process of creation. Once you realize the flow of cosmic energy inside, along with its source, you understand the creator of the universe, and its cosmic order.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: Our ancestors viewed nature not yet as a collection of objects, but as a growing together of related beings in a web of consciousness and energy.
author: Julie J. Morley

quote: Some say that somehow something came out of nothing and acted upon the nothing to produce everything, all for no reason. :-)
author: Arne Klingenberg

quote: Seeing’ two-dimensional images is therefore something that we learn to do; it is not an inevitable part of being human.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: I danced as he twirled in and out of consciousness, and there we were, one in love and the other astray.
author: Dominic Riccitello

quote: Moving man’s view of himself and life past common thinking, the true visionary faces great difficulty: exactly that deluded mindset the sage would have listeners outgrow is the very filter through which any new perspective must pass.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: You only feel powerless because your fear has given your power to the object of your fear. Once you realise this, you can claim it back.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: What makes mankind tragic is not that they are the victims of nature, it is that they are conscious of it.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: Our life is but a wave in the ocean of consciousness.
author: Russell Eric Dobda

quote: Hell, in my opinion, is never finding your true self and never living your own life or knowing who you are.
author: John Bradshaw

quote: Most of us respond with panic when we get what we want. The moment of victory is often the moment of greatest peril. We let success get to our head and start acting in over-confident ways. This is the beginning of self-destruction
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: Perception is like painting a scenery - no matter how beautifully you paint, it will still be a painting of the scenery, not the scenery itself.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: To struggle against the weight of sleep as reality eclipses the moon of your dreams is the purest sign of true love.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: There is a knowledge that is beyond the mind and the intellect, it is the wisdom of consciousness.
author: Belsebuub

quote: Thoughts become dreams. Dreams become reality. Reality becomes words. Words become stories. Stories inspire thoughts.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: Meditation is realizing and expanding your inner beauty in every direction.
author: Amit Ray

quote: We can allow our ego to react and sabotage or we can let our spirit run free in love. We are always in control of our actions.
author: Karen A. Baquiran

quote: We are consciousness playing a game with itself to see how it feels.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: I am neither the mind not the thought, I am its Creator.
author: Rajasaraswathii

quote: We make fiction because we are fiction ... It lived us into being and it lives us still.
author: Russell Hoban

quote: There is no other force, no other determining factor, no external cause to the cohesive unfolding of your life’s episodes – only your composite inner nature. Change that and you change your life.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Shamans submit to death in order to serve their communities.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Consciousness of unconsciousness
author: Philip K. Dick

quote: Genes come together to construct a magnificent life-form, while neurons come together to form our Illusion of Consciousness.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Everything starts from inside of us, then comes outside of us.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: Unlike any other empirical object in Nature, the mind's presence is immediately apparent to itself, but opaque to all external observers.
author: George Makari

quote: Man moves in a world that is nothing more or less than his consciousness objectified.–Neville Goddard
author: Neville Goddard

quote: All our sentiments - religious, romantic or any other - are born in the neurons.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: ...is impossible to specify what [consciousness] is, what it does, or why it evolved. Nothing worth reading has been written on it.
author: Stuart Sutherland

quote: It's treachery when one becomes God-body, spiritually inclined to the mind of a God-mentality. The ability of divinity is at the peak of a snowy mountain. Give ear to my words as this liquid flows through a golden fountain.
author: Jose R. Coronado

quote: Then he realized: 'I, indeed, am this creation; for I have poured it forth from myself.' In that way he became this creation. And verily, he who knows this becomes in this creation a creator.
author: Brihadaranyaka Upanishad

quote: The soul is infinite, made up of aspects that come and go all the time. It’s our nature for parts of the soul to travel while we meditate or dream. Through this process we grow, we learn new thoughts, thus desires, and our consciousness evolves.
author: S. Kelley Harrell

quote: That very way an infant goes to sleep, an adult awakens!
author: Saroj Aryal

quote: His was a great sin who first invented consciousness. Let us lose it for a few hours.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Enjoy this moment. The ultimate fulfilment of the dream will not come close to the dream. Enjoy it
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Though we may choose to view them symbolically, dreams are actually no more or less symbolic than everyday waking reality. When the images and events don't conform to our view of reality, we call them symbols. When they do, we call them facts.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: I believe consciousness is simply what it feels like to have a neocortex.
author: Jeff Hawkins

quote: Shine the light of awareness on your disempowering beliefs and choose to substitute them with empowering beliefs. This way you will choose love over fear and your path to purpose becomes clear.
author: Sharon Kirstin

quote: The Divine has created this moment in time. It is a very powerful moment, where there is only one way and that way is that you completely let go. Completely let go of what is known, what is safe, and move into the space of beauty.
author: Tony Samara

quote: We must unite the energies within to have a (w)holistic relationship with ourselves which gives us the capability to have a complete relationship with others.
author: Shalom Melchizedek

quote: Your Ego tells you that you were wronged and it validates your separation. Your Higher Self tells you that you were blessed and it validates your expansion.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Choose to long for love, to live in love, and to be the love so that you can achieve higher consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Don’t limit your potential, embrace then accentuate the Power of your Heart’s consciousness.
author: Steven Redhead

quote: What if I told you, that consciousness is not in the body, body is embedded in the consciousness.
author: Prana Gogia

quote: A woman should always know her place, and it's exactly wherever she wants to be.
author: Kierra C.T. Banks

quote: I was complaining of darkness not knowing that I am the source of light. I have to ignite the fire of consciousness to eradicate darkness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What seeks you when you are not seeking, is the universe's way of speaking to you without speaking.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: Some say that "there is no such thing as free lunch". And, I ask, why not? The joy of giving without expecting anything in return from a particular source is simply magic.
author: Ana Ortega

quote: Life is a manifestation of the unified field of consciousness. Colors, beauty, pleasure and pain are its songs of creation.
author: Amit Ray

quote: In the silence of consciousness I asked myself:why did I reject my life? And I answerDie Erde überwältigt mich:the earth defeats me.
author: Louise Glück

quote: We do not want to deny existence. Yet we also do not want to limit existence. Thus, we observe and honor without forming opinion, labeling, or adding a story to the object of our observation.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: They tell us the greatest love story is how water fell in love with fire. Or how satan fell in love with God. But the greatest love story to me is how I didn’t notice myself falling, when I fell in love with you
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Teo had once claimed that human history began with a storm: the interval between lightning and thunder, between flash and rumble felt in the body's core, was primitive man's first experiences of time -- the awakening of consciousness, the birth of the gods.
author: Max Gladstone

quote: You must not forget that when you think of yourself as special–you really are–you should think of the other people in a similar way. Everybody is special you meet during your life, everyone who has lived and lives on Earth.
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: To duplicate meanings is to isolate the consciousness.
author: Floriano Martins

quote: To be capable of embarrassment is the beginning of moral consciousness. Honor grows from qualms.
author: John Leonard

quote: Sleep knocks on my eyes: they grow heavy. Sleep touches my mouth: it stays open.Truly, he comes to me on soft soles, the dearest of thieves, and steals my thoughts from me
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: No label can define the immensity of your True nature. You are the awareness that precedes every label, the awareness that is perceiving these words and turning them into thoughts, the awareness that creates the world with every act of observation.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: The paradoxical situation with a vast number of people today is that they are half asleep when awake, and half awake when asleep, or when they want to sleep.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: How you see another person depends on your level of consciousness and awareness. It does not depend on that person.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Vocal cords are not rental units. No Hebrew prophet, nor Mohammed, nor any founder of any cult or religion ever spoke the words of anybody but themselves.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: The fundamental delusion of humanity is to suppose that I am here and you are out there. -Yasutani Roshi, Zen master (1885-1973)
author: Yasutani Roshi

quote: Improved memory made possible the long-term recollection of dreams and visions and the construction of those recollections into a spirit world.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: The power of speech does not rely upon meaning. Words carry energy all by themselves. They vibrate through the air, with the intention of the speaker, shaping consciousness and touching hearts whether understood or not.
author: Daniel Black

quote: Because in truth, my love, if you have thought of me once then I have thought of you a thousand times. You have captured my heart. It is yours. I am at your mercy now
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Don't give up on yourself. We all have the power to outshine and overcome our sorrows. Let this be the day you take a stand and believe you are indestructible.
author: Karen A. Baquiran

quote: Elohim is my salvation, my strength and my song.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The collective consciousness of mankind defines the existence and sustainability of this civilization.
author: Toba Beta

quote: Thinking can only serve to measure out the helplessness of thought.
author: H. Rider Haggard

quote: A philosopher's main task is to compulsively filibuster
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: Ideas are conceptualized because objects are materialized.
author: Joey Lawsin

quote: Islamophobia defines whether a person is really a thinking and sentient sapiens or an ignorant caveman.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Even heaven and hell arise just as we think they should be for we are each beings of consciousness creating our own reality.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: A sacred sexual spiritual partnership is essentially what at core, if not many, all of us, are searching for, or have searched for at some point in time, in ourselves, or in another.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Now if we only knew what it means to know, we would be conscious.
author: Atom Tate

quote: Media is Munchausen by proxy.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: You are here on earth to unearth who on earth you are.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Give someone everything you can think of, the wings to fly and the roots to stay. If they chose none of these hold the door open for them with a smile
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: The vastness of your imagination depends on the level of your consciousness, the power of your awareness, and the deepness of your perception.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Embrace contradictions for they make upall of life:You will eternally be looking for yourself andseeking ways to lose yourself.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Our deepest feelings never make it to consciousness let alone to paper.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Pain and darkness have been our lot since the Fall of Man. But there must be some hope that we can rise to a higher level ... that consciousness can evolve to a plane more benevolent than its counterpoint of a universe hardwired to indifference.
author: Dan Simmons

quote: Non-duality has been the root of all religious movements on this planet.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: When we live free in the eyes of our spirit, everything superficial that we were once conditioned to believe no longer matters. We should live only with the intention of LOVE and channel that power outward into the world.
author: Karen A. Baquiran

quote: Generally I try to avoid discussing consciousness, since it's, like, hard.
author: Robert Kurzban

quote: The energy of our thoughts, words, actions, and emotions collectively create the frequency of our vibrational aura.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: True human connection is found at the level of pure consciousness.
author: Patrick Zeis

quote: To attain to enlightenment is to attain to all. When you are not, you become the whole.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Consciousness blooms with the expansion of the heart.
author: Lindsay Godfree

quote: Since we're in bodies, and we honor our experiences within the body, we have wounds within us that need to be healed before we can get to the place of alignment.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Love transcends beyond eternity and it is perpetual as our own consciousness..
author: Dave Zebian

quote: Always put your heart into and show commitment in whatever you do
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Looking for consciousness in the brain is like looking inside a radio for the announcer
author: Nassim Haramein

quote: As we transcended and transformed from Neanderthal so will future humans transcend to a new level of consciousness and transform into a super human or homo-cosmicus.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Instead, it is more advantageous to consciously come to an awareness of what you perceived as love and understand the deeper lesson, which is attached to your growth, the growth that is ultimately meant to bring you to a place of wholeness.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: You already know everything, ayahuasca simply makes you aware of it!
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: BE the light you already are.
author: Sheri Bessi

quote: Shadows can only exist where there is light.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: We are therefore constantly on the road, straying from one mental image to the next, and identify with these images, and derive our identity from the images.
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: Even though without a brain, Mother Nature is mathematically, biologically, mechanically, chemically, logically intelligent.
author: Joey Lawsin

quote: Your frequency is what you frequently see. Pay attention to synchronicity as there are valuable lessons to be learned in the repetition of your reality.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: Always take an inventory of your life
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Everything is consciousness. YOU are consciousness and everything around you is a reflection of your [state of] consciousness.When you shift your consciousness, when you change, your life changes too.
author: Maria Erving

quote: People have moments of consciousness and epiphanies throughout their lives, but then suppress the realization.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: The ultimate aim of reality is to become science fiction!
author: Eli Of Kittim

quote: With silence comes mindfulness, and thus we become better at choosing our words with kind intent before we express them.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Energy does not judge, it merely creates.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Your calling should bless and affect the lives of others for good
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Vulnerability is the least celebrated emotion in our society
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: I believe it is reasonable to assume that higher-order consciousness developed neurologically in Africa before the second wave of emigration to the Middle East and Europe.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: It may be that DMT makes us able to perceive what the physicist call "dark matter" - the 95 per cent of the universe's mass that is known to exist but that at present remains invisible to our senses and instruments.
author: Graham Hancock

quote: Giving credence to persistent intuitions awakens the dormant heart consciousness.
author: Steven Redhead

quote: You have two choices: To live an unconscious life, or to be conscious of your magnificence...
author: Cloris Kylie

quote: The subconscious mind is the product of universal consciousness, universal knowledge, and universal beauty. It is the reflecting mirror of our conscious mind. The subconscious mind is always eager to manifest through our conscious mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The fact is: Jesus wrote not a solitary word that survives. Equally astounding is historical silence: not a single historical account refers to him during his lifetime from any source whatsoever, Roman or Jewish, official or personal.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: You have access to everything that has ever happened or ever will happen if you can only open your consciousness to receive it.
author: Russell Anthony Gibbs

quote: The Upper Palaeolithic figures known as ‘wounded men’ occur at Cougnac and Pech Merle, two sites in the Quercy district of France.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Time' is the illusional domain occupied by the state of boredom. 'Space' is the infinite - reality - experienced by the state of higher creative consciousness. Choose wisely.
author: T.F. Hodge

quote: Your personal identity very much depends on the experience of the present moment and as the experience changes, your identity too change with it.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: Ignorance is in each cell of our body and our consciousness. It's like a drop of ink diffused in a glass of water.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Spiritual preparedness is achieved with evolved consciousness.
author: Amitav Chowdhury

quote: If you are to suppose that natural reasons are the cause of everything, then it can only lead to the conclusion that consciousness is an illusion.
author: Lewis N. Roe

quote: To persevere with the will to understand in the face of obstacles is the heroism of consciousness.
author: Nathaniel Branden

quote: Often, your level of awareness defines your level of happiness. When we are self-centered, our happiness is transient. When our consciousness is soul-centered, we live in bliss.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The timing of making a change is just as important as knowing you need to make one.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Each person is a speck of consciousness that is attempting to awaken and return to its point of origin, to the source. That is life’s true journey and story.
author: Belsebuub

quote: If you always attach positive emotions to the things you want, and never attach negative emotions to the things you don't, then that which you desire most will invariably come your way.
author: Matt D. Miller

quote: Oh, there will still be deception. The fresh crew will emerge as adults, will have memories of past training and lives. Our stories, our lives, will go on. I refuse to allow that love to die, just because it was never real.
author: Greg Bear

quote: The universe gives birth to consciousness, and consciousness gives meaning to the universe.
author: John Archibald Wheeler

quote: I don't have to think, therefore I am.
author: Bert McCoy

quote: You must be more alive than life.You must see darkness danceand hear silence sing.You must be more awake than lightfor we aren’t born sleepingand we shouldn’t live sleeping.Only then will death’s slumberbecome sweet.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: I invite each of you to let go of your fears for just one day and say YES to life… say YES to love… say YES to You! You can always go back to saying ‘no’ another day.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Stress comes from lower vibrational consciousness; change your awareness to melt away stress.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Priscilla is in hell. Well, we all are. Life is torture, consciousness is torture. All our little devices are just morphia to stop us from screaming . . . We're each of us screaming away in our own private padded cell.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: You can discover your calling through the eyes of others
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Consciousness is in this present moment, the awareness with every cell in your body the direct and experience of love.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: What if you love your flaws?
author: Susanna Mittermaier

quote: Learn to do everything with speed to be efficient and effective
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Discomfort awakens the consciousness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Lao Tzu once said, 'Nature doesn’t hurry, yet everything is accomplished.'A single seed planted, eventually becomes a garden in time – when things get tough, tend to the garden in your mind.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: The true understanding of life and its purposes comes from an understanding of consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Only when we accept the fact that the world is never exactly as we see it through our individual lens of perception will we be able to accept ourselves or the mystery that is life itself.
author: Hal Zina Bennett

quote: The mind is not limited to the thoughts and imagination, but your mind is part of the cosmos of the universe. Your mind is whole awareness field.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: No one has any right to tell you that the way you perceive yourself is wrong. Because by doing so, they also discourage the person you aspire to be.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Life lies between the crossroads of the Nature of the Mind and the Mind of Nature.
author: Joey Lawsin

quote: Needing to express what it’s like here.... / Trying to digest the incoming stream .... / And dream it all over again.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: You always have to remind yourself that it is not what you have been through but what you overcome that will strengthen you. You will have memories that will forever remind you and push you forward so that you can continuously transform your life and mind.
author: Kemi Sogunle

quote: Faith is the bridge between God and ourselves.
author: Nozer Kanga

quote: If you seek small things to do, and do them well, great things will seek you, and demand to be performed.
author: Idries Shah

quote: Attempts to wake before our time are often punished, especially by those who love us most. Because they, bless them, are asleep. They think anyone who wakes up, or who, still asleep, realizes that what is taken to be real is a ‘dream’ is going crazy.
author: R.D. Laing

quote: Islamophobia may not actually be considered as a medical condition, unlike a medical condition, it is nothing but a primordial disgrace to the character of thinking humanity.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: My thoughts are the dance of my consciousness on the stage of my mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Mastery of impulse is all about self-discipline and choice. The mind is a powerful tool with which we have the ability to be in control of ourselves.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Societal peer pressure to conform runs strong, but as more of us continue to think and act for ourselves, rather than be under the influence of group-think, we begin to make more effective choices.
author: Evita Ochel

quote: We must search for that point in the centre of a problem from which all the pain radiates. We have to be brave enough to pull the simple, biting answer from the depths of our murky consciousness.
author: Donna Goddard

quote: The whole universe wants to contribute toyou. The world wants to contribute to you. The world wants to give you everything you desire—but you don’t ask.
author: Gary M. Douglas

quote: Nothing lasts, but nothing is lost. Seek the lesson, and you will find yourself.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: So, am I some sort of Savior? Not hardly. Save yourself the worry about needing to be saved from anything.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Don’t try to understand consciousness. Just try to be deeply conscious and it will reveal its secret to you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: This book attempts to record a journey to restoration that applies to ordinary people like you and I. It is a shot towards healing. A step headed for a new consciousness. It emerges from a moment in time where all seems lost.
author: Phindiwe Nkosi

quote: Extremities are flawed. Moderation is ideal, save for one occasion.So damn these eyes that weep too much.This mind that thinks too much. But never this heart that loves too much.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The most powerful tools of revolution through intention are humility and consciousness.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Primitive humans could not comprehend the vastness of infinity and eternity, so as a trick of self-preservation they came up with the perception of survival of the soul after death and its recurring incarnations.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Peace does not demand that everyone like or want the same reality.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: The subjectivity of consciousness is an irreducible feature of reality, and it must occupy as fundamental a place in any credible world view as matter, energy, space, time and numbers.
author: Thomas Nagel

quote: You are the only real authority in your life, but you yield that status to so many externals by believing in them, by having been punished or forced into accepting them.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: You need to understand the principle of intensity to reclaim time
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Every decision you make in life will stem from one of two options: love or fear. Choose love.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: Our consciousness is primitive; it is dependent on wants and needs.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Science and Religion are two vividly different realms of the human mind. They work differently at the molecular level, but the purpose of both is alleviation of the mind from the darkness of ignorance.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: I was afraid that after drinking Ayahuasca and experiencing death that I would get reckless and careless, but the exact opposite happens it appears that death is what gives life its meaning.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: Most people like mirrors; what they do not like, is people, who are mirrors.
author: Justin K. McFarlane Beau

quote: I – the eternal idea of oneness, have said this before – and now in the century 21st, say once again - Awake, my friend! Arise, my friend! Start walking my friend! And do not stop until you bring the change you wish to see in your society!
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: The power of love depends on the level of awareness and consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Negative input from the conscious mind results in a negative output from the subconscious mind. It’s the old law of cause and effect. To keep your thoughts pure, you must guard what goes into your mind.
author: Dr. Barbara Young

quote: Happiness depends upon our non-judgmental awareness and consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Ultimately, what I realized is I wasn’t looking for an equal partner, there was a knowing in place that I was energetically feeling for a partner who was also at a place of internal alignment.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Reality is a construct of the neurons.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: You have the power to choose consciousness.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Primary consciousness is a kind of ‘remembered present’…
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Many people have the confused idea that peace will happen when all the colors in the palette are the same. The actuality of peace is accepting each color’s differences and seeing the beauty each possesses.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: But the shadow is merely somewhat inferior, primitive, unadapted, and awkward; not wholly bad. It even contains childish or primitive qualities which would in a way vitalize and embellish human existence, but convention forbids!
author: Carl G. Jung

quote: Positive simply means unifying energies, while negative simply means separating energies. It's not about what's good or bad, right or wrong. It's about embracing what feels good and brings us closer to peace.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Silence nurtures the soul, relaxes the body temple and gives us the strength we need in moments of uncertainty. Welcome it.
author: Ana Ortega

quote: … when people ask about the meaning of life as if it were the job of our cosmos to give meaning to our existence, they’re getting it backward: It’s not our Universe giving meaning to conscious beings, but conscious beings giving meaning to our Universe.
author: Max Tegmark

quote: Later that day when I walked down this dried-out riverbed, enjoying the last rays of sunshine on my bare skin, I felt a deep inner peace coming up straight from my heart.
author: Nina Hrusa

quote: Pretending to have sentience is not the same as showing signs of sentience.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: The shortcut to happiness is truth.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: Your money is always consciously or unconsciously generating something.
author: Peta Kelly

quote: Forget your voice, sing!Forget your feet, dance!Forget your life, live!Forget yourself and be!
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: It is very difficult to break free from the prison of conformity and fixed false beliefs without changing our level of consciousness and awareness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your personal development doesn’t end when the relationship begins; everything in life requires consistent care to maintain. A working relationship involves accountability.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: We crave someone to love, chase someone to hate, and demand someone else decide who receives which fate.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: Our consciousness is pure when we are born, but with time it is infected and possessed by societal consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha
