quote: Our perception is our window to the world, and we need to wipe the dust off of our window often so we can continue to see through it clearly.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: Without awareness, the current of life cedes its sense of control to other deceptive agents that take you into a life that is toxic rather than nourishing.
author: Gary  Gordon

quote: What you hold in your consciousness tends to manifest—the inner game runs the outer game.
author: William A.  Adams

quote: How incredibly exciting this one meaningless thing can be, this life of yours.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: Without trust between the spiritual teacher and student it is not possible to attain to no-mind, because to attain no-mind needs trust.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Spiritual practice is allowing the temple (your body) to be full of light and to live life as a total celebration.
author: Tony Samara

quote: Coffee makes us severe, and grave and philosophical.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Ignite the light within you, it will make your world brighter.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: You need speed to regain your lost years
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Always live in the here and now
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: the essential feature of the Dissociative Disorders is a disruption in the usually integrated functions of consciousness, memory, identity,or perception
author: American Psychiatric Association

quote: You cannot be a light to others or yourself, if you have dark intentions in your heart.
author: Kemi Sogunle

quote: I start trying to stay unconscious. The problem with this is that no amount of willpower can change the reality.
author: Lauren DeStefano

quote: In every walk of life, you do have the freedom to choose, but that freedom is based on the perception of the world and yourself which you have gained until that moment of life.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: More than ever before, the time has come to learn to stick to the core of love directly. Without intermediaries. Love is your natural state of being. Love is who you are. You need nothing or no one outside yourself to hear love speak to you.
author: Ivo Valkenburg

quote: The depth of consciousness widens our breadth of understanding and makes us uniconscious.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To think is to have doubt....yet even thinking will bring you to "no thought"....eventually.
author: Vivian Amis

quote: There were at least four contexts in which San shamans acquired insights into the spiritual world: – the trance dance, – special curing rituals, – viewing rock art, and – dreams.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Follow your heart. It will lead you to where you need to be.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: There are other beings live in between interval rhythms of our consciousness.
author: Toba Beta

quote: I do not know about you. But, I prefer a life spent making mistakes than a life making none.
author: Ana Ortega

quote: The world is already yours - why try to conquer it?
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: The ego cleverly hides by projecting and by avoiding to look beyond what it merely believes.
author: Maria Erving

quote: The odds are stacked against you until you realize: You make the odds.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: Shamans enter the dream world of sub-consciousness to wrestle with demons and rally angels. They return with tales of their encounters which become the myths and legends of their communities.
author: Jeff Rasley

quote: Mind and Soul are one and the same thing.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: So material science can never get to the heart of what it really means to be human. We can only validate the essence of our existence through the deepest internal experience of awareness within us.
author: Dada Gunamuktananda

quote: They tell each other what they are thinking. But there is no reason to believe anything they say.
author: Kim Stanley Robinson

quote: All states of consciousness, no matter how mystical, ecstatic or divine, are gloriously born through the protoplasmic activity of the brain.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: If I know better than you know what I am up to, it is only because I spend more time with myself than you do.
author: Daniel C. Dennett

quote: What is truth, may not be the reality we see, and what is reality may not be the truth.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: The greatest crimes in the world are not committed against the body, but against the freedom of the consciousness.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Morality does not come to this mortal world from some imaginary paradise. It rises from the neurons of mortal humans.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: First time I died on Ayahuasca I was scared to death. And then, I realized that I was no longer afraid to die. It’s quite a gift.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: Find the Key ! Find the Key ! If you want to open the Doors of Heaven ! Without which, you can at best, look from outside, like the pauper looking in through the window at your food when hungry. Find the Key !
author: AainaA-Ridtz A R

quote: Our reality is colored by our vibration and belief systems. In other words, the experiences we have in the world with other people are dictated by the energy we bring with us wherever we go.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: It's all about consciousness, not (given or chosen) labels.
author: Arne Klingenberg

quote: Force is incomplete and therefore has to be fed energy constantly. Power is total and complete in itself and requires nothing from outside.
author: David Hawkins

quote: That means 19 or 20 of the books of the NT (New Testament) are anonymous. Many are blatantly pseudepigraphic (forgeries, see next section), with famous names applied to artificially promote veracity.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: In the course of our journey leading to Consciousness, our objective should not be creating a positive character, and thus a pleasant scenario, but finding the Existence behind every scenario.
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: Life follows a rhythm and we hold the drum.
author: Tom Althouse

quote: When we go closer to the divine, bliss is growing.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Though life may not always go the way you please, remember to always see the forest through the trees.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: Even though we think we have individuality, we still have a herd mentality. We often follow the dare-devil knowing that it is dangerous. We cling to conformity. We only transform when we reach awareness and consciousness. Then we will find true liberty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Whether consciousness is implanted in us by something divine, or whether it is created by the efforts of our brains, the end result is the same. We are.
author: Neal Shusterman

quote: In higher samadhi, in absence of any support, the consciousness is absorbed within itself in perfect awareness, clarity and peacefulness.
author: Amit Ray

quote: The consciousness of self is not the closing of a door to communication. Philosophic thought teaches us, on the contrary, that it is its guarantee. National consciousness, which is not nationalism, is the only thing that will give us an international dimension.
author: Frantz Fanon

quote: There is a self-destructive program running in the consciousness of humanity, and we must write a new program.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Philosophy may be blind without science, but science can lack vision without philosophy.
author: Scott O'Reilly

quote: A journey should not consist of getting from point A to point B but in realizing each step along the way. Do not search for conscious enlightenment, rather realize you are it and thus are one with all things.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: Being deeply, passionately, and intensely in love is being deeply, passionately, and intensely in life.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Scientists are in the strange position of being confronted daily by the indisputable fact of their own consciousness, yet with no way of explaining it.
author: Christian de Quincey

quote: There's Nothing To Hide When Your Soul Is Not Guilty....
author: Muhammad Imran Hasan

quote: Recalling his first dreams of flight when he was a small child, Max acknowledged that his entire existence had been building up to this tipping point where he could finally choose to release his self-imposedlimitations.
author: Sol Luckman

quote: Time wasters are life wasters
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Our relatedness with other living forms provides us something we sorely need: a reverence for the life of all creatures great and small, and an expanded view of our place in nature–not as rulers over it, but as participants in it.
author: Larry Dossey

quote: The best thing about photography: it changes your point of view.
author: Nina Hrusa

quote: Om is that God of love. Like a loving mother Om cleans us of our clutters collected through many incarnations.
author: Banani Ray

quote: People are real good at pointing out the high road, until it's time for them to take it themselves; under the same circumstances they told you to take it.
author: Niedria Dionne Kenny

quote: If today is not your day, then be happy for this day shall never return. And if today is your day, then be happy now for this day shall never return.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The wind plays its own music.
author: Bert McCoy

quote: You are just as connected to the Universe as a finger is to a hand, or as a branch is to a tree. The entire cosmos is expressing itself through your being.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: Reality is a construct of chemicals.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: You ever try holding, say, even a single chapter of a novel in your head? Consciously? All at once?
author: Peter Watts

quote: If you should not take your thoughts seriously, then why the thoughts of others?
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: In the morning, look at the glowing sunlight and allow it to brighten the consciousness of your mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be gone details of a mortal world, I am what I am and I shall always be free. The nothingness of this moment is the essence of existence.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: Ils venaient de prendre conscience de l'immensité de leur ignorance.
author: René Barjavel

quote: You are your neurons.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: To regain your lost years, you must make sure that any activity targeted at attaining your goal must be done with the qualities of intensity, speed and focus
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Serious spiritual practice is more than serene walks in the woods, lit candles and incense. You have to be committed. You have to be willing to enter into your own darkness and transcend it.
author: Maria Erving

quote: Its not the eyes, that makes the visualization of the external world possible, but its the perception out of the awareness field. Your eyes are the same, but you view two person differently.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: God is simply a magnificent state of the mind, where the finite turns infinite.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Love brings you closer to yourself
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: The one that looks beyond the mind knows there is only one truth to find. There among the highs and lows, in and outs and ups and downs remains a stillness every unbound.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: If we become aware that someone is sending thoughts of ill will in our direction, we do not argue with the apparent reality of malice. To do so would give it more substance. We remove the personal sense of ourself and the other person.
author: Donna Goddard

quote: Put down your glass, it is time to dance. If you want to get drunk all you need is to drink love. Put down your pipe and do away with these childish toys. If you want to get high all you need is to breathe love. Now, can I have this dance?
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: He was following the Earth through its days, drifting with the rhythms of its myriad pulses, seeping through the webs of its life, swelling with its tides, turning with its weight.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Wherever you decide to go, proceed with your mind.
author: Amitav Chowdhury

quote: Meditation is a death, a death of the ego. A meditator has to pass through a death. Meditation is the art of learning to die consciously. The spiritual teacher gives you meditation to die and to be reborn.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: The deft hand of the collective consciousness rules humankind. The atavistic echo of ancestral voices guides us in ways that often escapes our conscious, rational minds.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quote: Purposefully dedicating time into developing yourself is one of the keys to being effective in life
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There is no greater sensation of consciousness than to expend yourself completely through the quickening fires of passion.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Consciousness is either inexplicable illusion, or else revelation.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: I can now simply say that consciousness can be stretched out of the body like a giant piece of chewing gum without the need to have any defined diameter or length of the connection with the body.
author: Jozef Simkovic

quote: Utilise the combined power of creative consciousness of the heart, mind and higher self to manifest, modify and manage your total reality. Create a state of Bliss where everything is in perfect balance.
author: Steven Redhead

quote: Nature is harmonious when perceived as a whole which it is.
author: Wald Wassermann

quote: ...His argument, as set out in The Problems of Philosophy, was based on the empirical fact that we are not only aware of things but are also, very frequently, aware of being aware of them.
author: Alfred Jules Ayer

quote: The acknowledgement of a single possibility can change everything.
author: Aberjhani

quote: In Lascaux and other sites, hoofs are depicted to show their underside, or hoofprint.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Life lies between the crossroads of the Nature of Mind and the Mind of Nature.
author: Joey Lawsin

quote: Sooner or later on this journey, every traveller faces the same question: Are you a human intending to be a god, or a god pretending to be human?
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Because your life is a reflection of your inner Self, causality comes exclusively in changing your own nature, not trying to change the external world out there by manipulating it.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Consciousness doesn't emerge from matter because it has always been in matter. Consciousness is a fundamental quality that exists everywhere and in everything.
author: Steve Taylor

quote: Nothing is impossible. If you can envision your dreams, you have the power to make your dreams a reality. Have faith in yourself and don't be afraid to dream big. The biggest obstacle is yourself.
author: Karen A. Baquiran

quote: Every hour of your life that ticks by, there are numerous points and moments when you can choose to pause - and be aware of your mental and physical state. At any given point, you can freeze the flow that is your life, and be fully conscious for a moment.
author: Kevin Michel

quote: The natural consequence of being connected to the depth, what I call the soul, or your essence, is the attribute of joy.
author: Tony Samara

quote: My hours are filled with fantasy and indifference. In day and night dreams, I think of my heaven with you. All the time in between, I carelessly spend in hell without you.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The bite of conscience is indecent.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: True philosophy must start from the most immediate and comprehensive fact of consciousness: 'I am life that wants to live, in the midst of life that wants to live
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Life is the reflection of consciousness. Change your consciousness and your life will change.
author: Torkom Saraydarian

quote: New Testament gospels are traditionally accorded a cultural sanctity and lofty regard completely out of line with their literary worth.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Nothing exists except through human consciousness
author: George Orwell

quote: Life is a painted dream of consciousness on a canvass called the body.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your mind is not merely the vehicle of God, rather it is the life-force that keeps God alive. Without the Mind, there is no God. Without you, there is no God.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Language is the alchemy of transforming a thought into a word, and the word into a new reality.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: It is very possible to acknowledge another person’s concerns without entering into their vibration.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: On our Journey, we should not dwell on the guilt emerging because of dropping back to Ego-dominated state; instead, we should celebrate that we are in the state of the Presence!!
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: Scarcity of common sense makes it a philosophy.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Consciousness consists in a being becoming objective to itself; … it is nothing apart, nothing distinct from the being which is conscious of itself.
author: Ludwig Feuerbach

quote: True, the initial ideas are in general those of an individual, but the establishment of the reality and truth is in general the work of more than one person.
author: Willard F. Libby

quote: This seems to have been St. Augustine's very notion of "memory," not just nostalgia for some past moment, but connecting past, present, and future in one complete contemplative knowing.
author: Richard Rohr

quote: We have to consciously monitor and maximize our time effectively and efficiently
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Consciousness never exists alone; it always comes attached to a body.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: When human consciousness stops fooling itself and looks at the situation straight on, it can't cope.
author: Fuminori Nakamura

quote: All realities are really tricks of consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Be what you must, because who you are is all of us.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: The opposite of spiritual is not material but egotistical.
author: Michael Pollan

quote: A true friendship is determined by how well our friends stand by and support us in our toughest and most distressful times and, conversely, how well we support them in their difficult situations.
author: Nozer Kanga

quote: In your usual state of consciousness, there is a separate quale experience of everything you observe. But when you transcend into the domain of absolute divinity, all your qualia get mixed up.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: When we are, love is not.When we are not, love is.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Consciousness is the chronic pain of life, and all higher organisms suffer it every waking moment.
author: David Marusek

quote: A spark of every fire we seek is already within us.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: A fundamental shift of our perceptions and consciousness are necessary for any great improvements for mankind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: In one's awakening, the truest gift of consciousness and openness is recognizing SPIRIT in someone else. It is the mutual recognition and true connection between spirits that the SOUL MATE is born.
author: Karen A. Baquiran

quote: Similitude of the heart is like that of a telephone operator between man and God.
author: Riaz Ahmed Gohar Shahi

quote: Mind is the Alpha – Mind is the Omega. There is nothing else in the pursuit of knowledge. And more importantly, there is nothing else in education. All systems of the society should serve the mind, instead of the mind serving the systems.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: My experience is what I agree to attend to.
author: William James

quote: Original sin and conscious awareness of human fallibility is the perpetual agent of transformation in human affairs. Humankind’s behavior is pathological; it is an admixture of instinct and reason, kindness and cruelty, immorality and seeking redemption.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster

quote: The level of consciousness determines the deepness of thoughts and the awareness of the beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To be honest, as a species we may not live long enough to ever understand the true reality of the universe. But as the foundation of consciousness lies within the domain of biology one day we shall know all there is to know about it.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: A tree is more conscious than we are; she expresses her awareness slowly and silently with beauty. Our consciousness is very limited, but we are blessed with a language to express or superficial consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Percibir es como pintar un paisaje –no importa cuán hermoso lo pintes. Siempre será una pintura del paisaje, no el paisaje mismo.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Everything that brings us well being is achieved through allowing ourselves to flow with life and be in harmony. Pain happens, it is our attachment to the pain and our resistance to change that causes suffering.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: A child comes from God, a child is a gift from God, but a child is not our possession. Give the child unconditional love and freedom. Respect the child, the child has its own soul. The child has its own way.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Love is the path that guides the men to the fields of infinite LIGHT!
author: Dave Zebian

quote: If there were nothing but thought in you. You wouldn't even know your thinking. You would be like a dreamer who doesn't know he's dreaming. You would be as identified with thought as a dreamer is with every image in the dream.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: The neurological condition of echopraxia is to autonomy as blindsight is to consciousness.
author: Peter Watts

quote: There are many levels of consciousness, but atomic consciousness or universal consciousness is the basis of all other levels of consciousness. A tree is very much conscious even though in our point of view they are not conscious.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: That amazing, astonishing, and magical light that is inside of you is enlightening the whole world is nothing but your consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I want you to smile. I want you to truly smile today.Realize that right now you are where you need to be. And, there is no need to rush. You are on-time, you always have been and you will always be. Please keep smiling.
author: Ana Ortega

quote: from CHAOS?Trust the imagination. Peace is knowing without need for detailed explanation. Joy is openness to possibility. Sing your humming heart free from the heat of all creation. Swim into cool whirling coloured pools. Sleep on rock of consciousness.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: Whatever beliefs and definitions you hold will seem to be true.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: If you cannot reach a state of utter oneness with each other, how do you expect to solve anything? Separate the world will crumble; together the world will thrive.
author: Jennifer Ott

quote: Peace of mind arrives the moment you come to peace with the contents of your mind.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: We no longer have any time to waste, entertaining our dark side. It is time we recognize those evil elements of our internal world and start working untiringly on eradicating them.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: The notion that an image is a scale model of something else (say, a horse) requires a different set of mental events and conventions from those that perceive the social symbolism of red marks on someone’s chest.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Believing without questioning is an insult to the human conscience.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Take your life out of high gear and disengage the autopilot mode. Try living mindfully and avoid the pattern of living in a reactive manner.
author: Nanette Mathews

quote: The seventh element is ‘consciousness’ that raises a human from the basic corporeal state and takes them to super-consciousness.
author: Girdhar Joshi

quote: Çelişkili duyarlıklara aynı anda yer veren insanın iç dünyası çok başkaydı. Bir Bach sonatıyla bir Beethoven senfonisinin yanyana çalınması onun yanında bir şey ifade etmiyordu.
author: Oğuz Atay

quote: A ‘caring’ judgment is still a judgment. And any form of judgment creates blocks and stagnation.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Sexual arousal and penal erections are associated with both altered states of consciousness and sleep.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: All answers lie in the neurons.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Your intensity increases your net worth
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Based upon quantum mechanics, our physical reality should not be solid. Most likely our physical reality is an elaborate illusion within our own consciousness and the collective consciousness of the Universe/God.
author: Russell Anthony Gibbs

quote: We are not at the center of ourselves, but instead — like the Earth in the Milky Way, and the Milky Way in the universe — far out on a distant edge, hearing little of what is transpiring.
author: David Eagleman

quote: I do not mean, of course, that we can always accurately express our conscious thoughts with Proustian accuracy. Consciousness overflows language: we perceive vastly more than we can describe.
author: Stanislas Dehaene

quote: Our learned egocentric and judgmental consciousness is the source of unhappiness; however, universal consciousness is always blissful.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It is when you begin to accept yourself in totality that you come into alignment with your wholeness. For example, when you accept something in totality you are recognizing it within its full potential and full divinity.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: The moment you open yourself completely to the love that awaits your conscious embrace, you are no longer there to receive it.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: When we're consciously aware, we receive the messages the universe sends to answer us through intuition that could be easily missed if we weren't living in the moment. These messages will guide us to our true path.
author: Nanette Mathews

quote: ​Soul neither comes from somewhere, nor does it go somewhere.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: A spiritual man is happy with the whole existence. He says "yes" to the whole existence.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: The current climate change is an outer mirror of our inner consciousness. It is an outer mirror of our attitude to try to conquer nature, instead of being in harmony with nature, but in the end the part can never conquer the whole.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: You are in love with your own reflection of the universe.
author: Phoebe Garnsworthy

quote: Get back to your prayers and to meditating again. THE SOUL KNOWS THINGS THE MIND HAS NEVER LEARNED.
author: Marjory Sheba

quote: Was I asleep? Had I slept?
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: Through our consciousness, we can enter the stillness of silence and become blessed with the universal presence of peace.
author: Georgi Y. Johnson

quote: I now argue that entry into Upper Palaeolithic caves was probably seen as virtually indistinguishable from entry into the mental vortex that leads to the experiences and hallucinations of deep trance.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: What seems like a flaw is merely our higher consciousness telling us we're not looking at it in the right light yet.
author: A.J. Darkholme

quote: Entering a cave” or rock was a metaphor for a shaman’s altered state; therefore, caves (and rocks more generally) were considered entrances or portals to the supernatural world.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Education is not the acquisition of degrees. It is the broadening of one's mind. It is the process of undertaking and imparting true knowledge. It is the awakening of one's consciousness towards the Universe withing us and the Universe around us.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Memory is essential to who we are, and memories can be both implicit and explicit - unconscious and conscious.
author: Siri Hustvedt

quote: A mind is a simulation that simulates itself.
author: Erol Ozan

quote: When love is expressed in life and imbued into every great work, the potential for evolution expands exponentially.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: The purpose of suffering is to contain the light of your desire until you see yourself in everything.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Our consciousness is the transient reflection of universal consciousness. We shape it and make it our own with our shifting and changing awareness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The inner emptiness is the door to God.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Having a healthy and harmonious relationship with yourself is genuinely feeling gratitude for your existence and truly accepting yourself in totality.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Existence is Identity, Consciousness is Identification.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Everything is nothing to an individual until they recognize and define it to be something.
author: Dr. Jacent Mpalyenkana

quote: Your soul will get you through tough times with no money, better than your money will get you through times with no soul.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: Our perception of space-time can be thought of in terms of event coordinates relative to our current state of consciousness.
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quote: Let’s train ourselves to not hate each other; we all come from the same consciousness in the mind.
author: Allan Wesler

quote: You deserve a better life. You deserve a prosperous life. You deserve a positive life. You deserve to be liberated from all negativity. You deserve the best!
author: Karen A. Baquiran

quote: Could you imagine a windstorm without the rustling of the leaves? You are made of the same stuff as the leaves–and the wind. You are meant to be rustled and sung.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: If we really love ourselves at all levels, why should we let our inner peace be upset by the thoughts, feelings or actions of others?
author: Ivo Valkenburg

quote: Dance bravely into your own heart, and you will find the love of all.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: It is human nature to long for a deep and fulfilling soul connection with another but the first step to a soul connection is having a connection with your own soul.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Fear and pain should be treated as signals not to close our eyes but to open them wider.
author: Nathaniel Branden

quote: It doesn't matter how you conceive of divinity. It only matters that you see it in everything, including yourself.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: We can only forgive the world to the extent that we forgive ourselves for being in it.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Arranging atoms in certain ways appears to bring about an experience of being that very collection of atoms. This is undoubtedly one of the deepest mysteries given to us to contemplate.
author: Sam Harris

quote: The awakening process is not about 'finding who you are' but more about finding out about the ego, about who you are not.
author: Maria Erving

quote: There are people who have the capacity to imagine themselves as someone else, there are people who have no such capacity (when the lack is extreme, we call them psychopaths), and there are people who have the capacity but choose not to exercise it.
author: J.M. Coetzee

quote: Knowing the Truth is not based on knowledge, but on being "it".
author: Vivian Amis

quote: But the true feminist deals out of a lesbian consciousness whether or not she ever sleeps with women.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: And he was. Suddenly. From not being to being conscious that he was.
author: Gioconda Belli

quote: Don't allow someone else's thoughts become the illustrations of YOUR story
author: Netiera Danise

quote: The mind is an empire unto itself.
author: Steven Redhead

quote: Spirituality is committing suicide. Consciousness is attempting to will itself out of existence.
author: Jaron Lanier

quote: To see through the illusion of duality, remember that fear and darkness have no substance in themselves, for they do not indicate the presence of a second universal force, but are only names given to the one Light unperceived.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: One part of my consciousness serves only one realm.
author: Toba Beta

quote: A conscious being without free will is simply a metaphysical absurdity.
author: Raymond M. Smullyan

quote: It is not so much being all that we dream of becoming as it is un-becoming all that is covering our being.
author: Sepi

quote: Consciousness has evolved biologically and can therefore be explained biologically.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Today, there are very few unicorns left, and not many witches or wizards. But there is always magic—the power to create sufficient conditions for spirits to manifest, to bring consciousness from the realms of potential into the world of action.
author: Israel Morrow

quote: To experience what isn't, love what is.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: All you need to get by in this world is the memory of love
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: I know that these mental disturbances of mine are not dangerous and give no promise of a storm; to express what I complain of in apt metaphor, I am distressed, not by a tempest, but by sea-sickness.
author: Seneca

quote: Acceptance is the vessel of realization.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Happiness is purely a chosen state of being available to all, at all times.I choose to be happy, because I am.
author: Raphael Zernoff

quote: Quoting Father Seraphim:Our life hangs only by a breath. It is the thread that links you to the Father, the Source, which brought you into being. Be conscious of this thread, and go where you will. (27)
author: Jean-Yves Leloup

quote: Je öfter wir unserem Selbst mit Wertschätzung und Achtsamkeit begegnen, uns liebevoll annehmen wie wir sind, desto häufiger werden uns Menschen auf dieselbe Art und Weise gegenübertreten.
author: Nina Hrusa

quote: Every moment, we create a new reality, and then the earlier reality loses its accountability.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Consciousness is not just interaction of neurotransmitters in the brain it has also some quantum cosmic component.
author: Amit Ray

quote: When you take a solemn oath your heart and soul listens, then perception of consciousness and unity comes.
author: Vasilios Karpos

quote: No, free will is not an 'extra'; it is part and parcel of the very essence of consciousness. A conscious being without free will is simply a metaphysical absurdity.
author: Raymond Smullyan

quote: Naturalism is the least subjective reality in this human world.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: The degree of freedom we enjoy outwardly is a reflection of the degree of love we cultivate inwardly.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Observing the stream of eternal and simple truth is the same for all who look upon the fountainhead of consciousness.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: In terms of idols which represented various gods: worshipping an idol or star cluster is no different than worshipping a concept.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: We have the mind and the consciousness of the universe. Due to our ignorance, we see the world and our own selves divided and separated into two units. A truly wise person sees the entire world in the self and the self in the world.
author: Awdhesh Singh

quote: Theere is an imperative to be in a process, the energy & consciousness of life means for us to be constantly observing, learning & becoming.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: For it is through the darkness of the evening that we are able to see the stars. Without this darkness, we would never get to experience the beauty of the cosmos, or understand the little bits of light in life that shine through the void.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: There are predators in these woods. There are sly foxes, mean skunks and rabbits that will skip out on you when you need them the most. The only way to be safe is to learn who you are; then, you can become who you want to be.
author: Jacqueline Edgington

quote: The fearful seek to serve themselves by mastering the world, while the fearless seek to serve the world by mastering themselves.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: At each moment, our seemingly objective world emerges from the dancing of consciousness with a single untruth: that there is something out there which is not us.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Each of us at our root is consciousness, and in the highest of the spiritual realms life and form become light. I experienced this in an OBE in which I went to the outer ring of the source of creation.
author: Belsebuub

quote: Conscience is worse than death, some people commit suicide to evade it.
author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quote: To create possibilities... you have to go beyond whats normal!
author: Susanna Mittermaier

quote: More than ninety-five percent of your brain activity, as you consciously read this sentence, is being used by your subconscious mind.
author: Kevin Michel

quote: It may be inevitable that mankind has to suffer so that it may gain experience to transcend and transform her collective consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Consciousness is a magic of our brain and an illusion of our mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: 1. I alone am whole.2. I am balanced.3. I am aware that my inner world creates my outer world and I choose to create a positive loving environment.4. I have the power within me to change my world.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Our levels of consciousness and awareness define our wants and needs. When we achieve higher levels of consciousness, our wants cease to exist.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We are Love experiencing itself in human form.
author: Wald Wassermann

quote: Love's wide daybreak draws the inturned eyeBeyond the cramping consciousness of boneAnd self escapes itself for once to fly.
author: Otis Kidwell Burger

quote: Of course, the original (anonymous) writer of (the Gospel of) John didn’t use quotes – as they didn’t exist in written Greek – but the translator/publisher of the modern Bible does. And that style strongly implies a validity that is pure illusion.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: You are one and only creator of your reality. Even when you might think there is some external force out there creating it for you, it is just you.
author: Raphael Zernoff

quote: The trick when it comes to dealing with depression is being able to imagine yourself out of it. When you can picture a happier life, you will be determined to work at the things that prevent it from happening.
author: Keysha Jade

quote: Higher consciousness means your self consciousness ceases to exist; you become the ocean of life and a part of the universe.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Random thought fills the streambed, cascading with care and spilling over the flood plain until bifurcation forces it to arc and fork into a single, determined stream.
author: Lorii Myers

quote: Out of all the infinite possibilities that can take form and exist, you are one. And so am I. You and I are related in ways we know little about.
author: Rajesh`

quote: God sees God everywhere.
author: Francis Lucille

quote: We all came from the same source and it's energy in form of light shining in every consciousness.
author: Dave Zebian

quote: As you begin to look deeply into the mystery of your own evolution, in place of good and evil you will find only stories, finished or unfinished.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Infinite and finite are both mental constructs.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: I feel a void within me sometimes. It’s like the nothingness that exists in the universe has seeped into me.
author: Rajesh`

quote: Each person you meetis an aspect of yourself,clamoring for love.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: You need focus and concentration to be effective in life
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: When you really want to find the answers to the great questions of your life, you need to look for them deep in yourself.
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: Judgment is contrary to the vibration of unconditional love
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Without the harmonious electrochemical activity of all the brain structure, the very thing which we call "mind", would suddenly disappear from the face of earth.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Everyone is Love without realizing it, this although Love realizes everyone.
author: Wald Wassermann

quote: The Universe is alive, conscious, and aware.
author: Chris Prentiss

quote: Your calling is buried in your background and life experience
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: As you embrace Consciousness, you embrace Perfection.
author: Tony Samara

quote: In reality, what we call spirit is our universal consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The universe and the body is the playground of consciousness and the mind is the instrument of consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You do not have an existence independent of your environment, but rather you are your environment, and your environment is you.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: Our hearts are channels from which we experience and are connected to the divine flow of creation, it’s the channel in which we transcend our emotions and come to know love. In this space, we exist without constructs.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Human beings only can grow by changing awareness and consciousness about their surroundings and about the universe as a whole.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Two great things happened to me. One was that I survived. The other was that I met you, because I knew why
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The question - do we have free will, itself is not appropriate. We should mend our perspective a little, and start asking the question, do we have the freedom of will, based on our experiences?
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: It was the ultimate celestial orgasm and I felt like a cup overflowing with plenty. The pulse of God moving through me brought such intense pleasure that I felt I might burst like the ripest berry in the sun.
author: Linda Cull

quote: The fountain of youth resides in our memory. You will never outlive your shadow.
author: Lorin Morgan-Richards

quote: Man (and woman) has an infinite capacity for self-development. Equally, he has an infinite capacity for self-destruction. A human being may be clinically alive and yet, despite all appearances, spiritually dead.
author: Idries Shah

quote: The amount of value produced at a certain period depends on the level of focus used to attain it
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Keep Calm and Find Your Zen-ity
author: Nanette Mathews

quote: Humility and full consciousness are inseparable.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: All human endeavors are the achievements of the little specks of jelly in your head.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Your reality is a reflection of yourself
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: Awareness is Brahman. The absolute cosmic consciousness. When you are aware, you are connected with Brahman.
author: Banani Ray

quote: By becoming aware of our existence we come to the realization that we are never disconnected from source energy or the divine.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: It is better to be foolish than a dilettante.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Worry notif you are in darknessand the void sucks you in further.This is not the place we go to die.It’s where we are bornand our stories begin.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Even feigning surprise, pretending it was unexpected and saying a ritual thanks, is surely wiser than just expecting everything so carelessly.
author: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: Until you are conscious of your conscience, you are morally unconscious.
author: Donald L. Hicks

quote: Art is a consciousness-provoking vessel.
author: ELLE NICOLAI

quote: Consciousness is the core of humanity. It can be a curse or it can be a cure. Only humanity can decide how to break the curse and be the cure.
author: Jennifer Ott

quote: I’m not here to disagree with people or try to change anyone’s mind. I’m just here to accept and love others right where they are – no matter their belief systems or backgrounds.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: When you can no longer tell the difference between being yourself and being love, you are not far from waking up.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Jump every hurdle. If you feel like everything negative has happened to you, you were given these obstacles because the Universe knows that you are strong enough to handle it.
author: Karen A. Baquiran

quote: Indigo, the deep blue contains an abundance of sapphires shining their light through the density, awakening and stirring our consciousness. In the daylight the sea will change, but for now it remains mysterious, obtainable through our imagination.
author: Jennifer  Lynch

quote: You're never alone if you're with your soul.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: Every day I wake up and ask myself, ‘How can I accept myself and others more fully?
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Every 'no' is a 'yes' to something.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: When you are aware that you are thinking, that awareness is not part of thinking. It is a different dimension of consciousness. It is that awareness that says "I AM
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: A fish cannot be aware of the ocean, before jumping up out of water.
author: Rixa White

quote: As a nation we should look more carefully at how our fear of future acts of terrorism is undermining our quality of life.
author: Bruce H. Lipton

quote: In choosing consciousness, we gift ourselves with presence.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Consider this:1. Would you ride in a car whose driver was on the consciousness-expanding "entheogenic" drug LSD?And here's a bonus question:2. Why does an "expanded consciousness" include the inability to operate a motor vehicle?
author: Brad Warner

quote: Ultimately, co-dependency ends when you make the choice to stop relating in co-dependent ways and by developing a healthy, harmonious relationship with yourself.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: I like anything that is thought provoking and elevates one's consciousness to the highest and out of it's safety net, making one breathe aspiration.
author: Petra Remes

quote: Reconnecting with your soul is painful, but the benefits are everlasting.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: Your child dreads to become alive and real because he fears that in doing so, the risk of annihilation is immediately potentiated.
author: Joy Williams

quote: If your mind carries a heavy burden of past, you will experience more of the same. The past perpetuates itself through lack of presence. The quality of your consciousness at this moment is what shapes the future.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: I love sleeping. Waking is more and more hateful the older I get. I say this as if I've lived too long. I'm twenty-two.
author: Helen Oyeyemi

quote: True pillar of subtle light embrace humanity between dimensions, they are serene consciousness washing the pains of all soul's.
author: Dave Zebian

quote: The behaviour of the human nervous system in certain altered states creates the illusion of dissociation from one’s body (less commonly understood in hunting and gathering shamanistic societies as possession by spirits).
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: The programming of the consciousness is based upon what is accepted or believed.
author: Steven Redhead

quote: We are still living in a wonderful new world where man thinks himself astonishingly new and "modern." This is unmistakable proof of the youthfulness of human consciousness, which has not yet grown aware of its historical antecedents.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: Remember your name. Remember that you and I are brothers, are the children of trans-Atlantic rape. Remember the broader consciousness that comes with that. Remember that this consciousness can never ultimately be racial; it must be cosmic
author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

quote: Even though we fear change, there is no transformation of consciousness without going through some changes.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Learn to love and you will learn to live.
author: Ana Ortega

quote: I don’t see doctrines, when I talk about religions. All I see are different experiential realities of the one and the same neuronal Kingdom of God.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Consciousness is an ocean where we swim without knowing its significance, existence, depth, dimension, or vastness. If we go out of this ocean, we will not exist anymore.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What our consciousness is experiencing is just a sliver of the infinite, multiple realities where we exist simultaneously
author: Russell Anthony Gibbs

quote: ​I wanted to present Neuroscience to people in a way that would diminish their differences.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Islaam is the Name of the Universe. Christ is the Soul, and Abraham, the Foundation — The Rainbow At Midnight
author: AainaA-Ridtz A R

quote: I have the power to make choices that are in alignment with my highest good when it comes to my relationships.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: If you become full-blown consciousness, everything that can be known will be known to you.
author: Sadghuru

quote: To be the body-mind or not to be the body-mind, this is the question.
author: Bert McCoy

quote: Ascension through all levels of consciousness and awareness can only happen when you live life as you, and not how others think you should live. How could self-realization possibly be anything other than being yourself?
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Do not only think about it, but feel about it, also, before taking appropriate action.
author: T.F. Hodge

quote: Happiness, is one meeting away, and it’s a meeting with yourself.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: The perception of reality is something that is constructed by the human mind based on its own needs and knacks.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Some researchers believe that dreaming is what happens when sensory input to the brain is greatly diminished: the brain then ‘freewheels’, synapses firing more or less at random, and the brain tries to make sense of the resultant stream of images.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: If you think about consciousness long enough, you either become a panpsychist or you go into administration.
author: John Perry

quote: You must live a life of self-consciousness always
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Om is the things, Om is the ingredient, Om is the container and the content of this universe.
author: Banani Ray

quote: The only thing we need to heal is the belief that we are not already whole.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: There are no higher levels of consciousness, there are only different ways of perceiving things.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: You must, first of all, evolve the consciousness of being the best in whatever territory you choose to explore and then invest all your time into it and you will be amazed how easy it is to become great.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: What is life to Spirit, is death to the ego.
author: Vivian Amis

quote: I would rather be a conscious wrongdoer than a mindless saint.
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: By the way, if anyone here is in advertising or marketing, kill yourself.
author: Bill Hicks

quote: Nature is such as to give rise to conscious beings with minds; and it is such as to be comprehensible to such beings. Ultimately therefore such beings should be comprehensible to themselves.
author: Thomas Nagel

quote: The level of consciousness defines the level of understanding and awareness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Consciousness of the world itself is nature. And when you destroy nature you block off consciousness from the world.
author: Matthew Donnelly

quote: Do not sacrifice your sense to satisfy your sentiments.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: If, as some savants of consciousness suggest, we are actually agreeing to create, from moment to moment, everything we perceive as real, then it stands to reason that we're also responsible for keeping it going in some harmonious manner.
author: Phil Lesh

quote: The real You is hidden beneath the mental noise in Your head.
author: Bert McCoy

quote: Consciousness is simply the brain’s neural response to its surrounding environmental stimuli. Hence when the neural circuits malfunction, Consciousness tends to malfunction as well.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Life can be like a roller coaster with its ups and downs. What matters is whether you are keeping your eyes open or closed during the ride and who is next to you.
author: Ana Ortega

quote: When we consciously tie our most significant dreams to our daily actions, we pull ourselves out of the muck and step firmly onto the path that leads to success.
author: Richie Norton

quote: Give yourself permission to enjoy this present moment. Resist the urge to fill it with I need to's, I shoulds, I coulds. Trying to fill all your present moments is impeding the natural flow of life.
author: Nanette Mathews

quote: God is not an Almighty Being watching over life on earth. God is the Event Horizon of Human Consciousness.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: The male is the giving part of a sexual union and the female is the receptive part. Since the wombman is the receiver she must be aware of her partner’s spiritual nature before choosing to be intimate with him.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Once out of your cradle, you don't focus on the world in the abstract, perceiving things for the first time, but in synchrony with your accumulated knowledge, which enriches and helps define your experience, as well as ensuring its uniqueness.
author: Winifred Gallagher

quote: There is no shortcut to confidence building; it is a process that involves succeeding at something challenging. One needs to consciously work on every aspect of confidence building whether for one's own benefit or the benefit of others.
author: Vishwas Chavan

quote: All human experiences, from the feeling of love, to the presence of God emerge from various brain activity.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: The mind is created when the universal consciousness conforms to societal consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The waves of love roll throughout the Universe, and overflow in our hearts..Everything is ONE!
author: Dave Zebian

quote: The very nature of compassion and forgiveness does not imply the hindrance of self but rather the understanding towards another. In order to truly understand another, you must first understand self and your stance within any situation.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: The war consciousness is purposely cultivated to guide the male away from the natural, healthy balances between masculine and feminine energies, and toward more unbalanced and detached psychologies.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Our ability to convert time determines how great we will become
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: You have to realize that modern power, is nothing but a concept in the mind of the one who’s under the power. And once you realize this, you realize that authority is indeed an illusion.
author: Phoenix Sinistra

quote: It is to be recognized that the negative emotions and the guilt that comes with it is not a part of the Consciousness, it only belongs to the mind!
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: Your name may be 'writ in water', but for now, you have the great advantage of being a wave that can think.
author: D.J. MacLennan

quote: In the society of thinking humanity, the natural law of trust should be - In I, I trust.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Sculptors feel that somebody else is using their hands, that they couldn’t possibly be doing this.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Consciousness is the awareness that emerges out of the dialectical tension between possibilities and limitations.
author: Rollo May

quote: We are therefore blessed with powerful minds yet at the same time cursed, not only to die, but to know that we must.
author: Stephen  Cave

quote: Life is like a game - we should be curious to play it - you explore and learn and grow - that is what it is for - that and having fun. It all expands consciousness- your own, the collective, and the cosmic.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: Being different entails consequences but I like to think they're privileges.
author: Louise Philippe Dulay

quote: It must be obvious that the Reality we all encounter only works one way, and it functions that way regardless of what the experiencer believes.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Let inspiration guide your actions.
author: Ana Ortega

quote: Eternity will not cause our memories to fade, it will force our hearts to accept the past.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: Your fear of becoming a cliche is what turns you into one. If you remove the fear, we are all really walking contradictions, hypocrites and paradoxical cliches
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: Happiness is the fragrance of inner awareness during the dance of consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Humans are wired to want to share love, the essence of our being, with others. The more we close this area off by holding onto anger, frustrations, resentments and disappointments, the less we are able to love ourselves and others.
author: Antonia Hall

quote: Our society shuns people for being a bright light in the world. Sometimes if you are too futuristic people do not like how revolutionary you are
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: In certain diseased conditions consciousness is a mere spark, without memory of the past or thought of the future, and with the present narrowed down to some one simple emotion or sensation of the body.
author: William James

quote: We can tell a lot about a creature's level of consciousness by understanding their perception of death.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: To define oneself, is to suffer duality. One must avoid defining existence and identity.
author: Mark Mandemaker

quote: She placed her hand on her chest and thought, 'So this is what the poets write about'.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The Greatest Companionship you have is your Mind... Your Conscience Mind... The one which talks to you ! The only thing you need to make sure is that; it's positive !
author: Alamvusha

quote: Many a person cannot bear the thought of being completely controlled by the unconscious.
author: Edmund Bergler

quote: The Supreme lesson of Life is Love....
author: Jacqueline Ripstein

quote: You’ve got to stop thinking of consciousness as your own. You’re only thinking for yourself when you are by yourself. As soon as you are in the presence of others, your consciousness is linked at some level to those others.
author: James Rozoff

quote: The alchemy of life is to turn coins into cents, by making sense of change.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: Until we heal the root cause of our suffering, and awaken to our true nature, our inherent confusion will continue to manifest itself in the world around us.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: When you are here, God is near.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The highest activities of consciousness have their origins in physical occurrences of the brain just as the loveliest melodies are not too sublime to be expressed by notes.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Consciousness has no religion, and love can bloom in every season.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you discover the difference between consciousness and the brain, you will discover yourself.
author: Jenna Alatari

quote: Sometimes I long to forget… It is painful to be conscious of two worlds.
author: Eva Hoffman

quote: Consciousness is nothing but a neuro-chemical and a mechanical action of the body. Consciousness is important, but the expression of thoughts with language makes us human. Everything is conscious, but levels of consciousness are different.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everything shifts when you add another to any equation, if you have no stability within yourself first you will not be able to find it with another.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: My ego is my employee – and I, the witness, am its employer.
author: Dana Gore

quote: Are you choosing your life from the past, the expectation of the future, or from this very moment?
author: Susanna Mittermaier

quote: Live simply. Deepest joy is like a flower....beautiful in essence.
author: Tony Samara

quote: Idris: Are all people like this?The Doctor: Like what?Idris: So much bigger on the inside.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Die wertvollste Reise ist die Reise zu unserem Selbst.
author: Nina Hrusa

quote: Cosmic love is your birthright. Meditative sensitivity opens you up to the higher realms of existence. The explosive cosmic and soul love we seek can only be experienced when your heart is fully open first.
author: Shalom Melchizedek

quote: Life does not dictate concept, definition, or purpose; neither individually nor universally.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: What you are seeking in your retreat, I see clearly in every road and alleyway.
author: Idries Shah

quote: To completely understand me you must first accept that I am not you.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: For how can any human be separate from humanity and humanness?
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Where there is no consciousness, there is no time.
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quote: Your Real Self is the permanent atom of your identity, the rock of ages that remains unmoved by the restless tides of life.
author: Elizabeth Clare Prophet

quote: Călătoria prin toate viețile noastre este o reamintire conștientă a tot ceea ce știm.
author: Suzanne Ward

quote: Each day I wake up with a naive perspective of life and universe, and walk towards understanding a little more about the true nature of human perception with all its vivacious nuances and behavioral expressions.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: False humility is the pride of not being proud, real humility is without the consciousness that pride exists.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: Even the most aware of us do not realize the infinite power we possess or the magnitude of the ability we have to create, transmute, and transcend.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: To have a deeper understanding of life one must pause from looking outward and travel inward into the depths of consciousness.
author: Jiulio Consiglio

quote: Meditation gives clear understanding about body and brain interface with consciousness
author: Amit Ray

quote: One of my relatives invented the sensory deprivation tank. Appropriately, most of my family has never seen or heard of him.
author: Ryan Lilly

quote: Everyone is doing the best they can with what they know, and we are all here to learn and grow.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Until we face the war within ourselves, the world will never change.
author: Dana Gore

quote: You are not who you think.You're not even the thinker.You are the one conscious of the thought.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: To the extent you expand your consciousness is the extent to which you experience being divine.
author: Erin Fall Haskell

quote: Intensity is the extreme application of force and strength
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The best thing you can do in this life is share your open heart with the world.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: I am exactly who I am choosing to be. Should I change my choice, the universe will always be there to assist me.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: All our unique human achievements may seem to be the creation of the unique human mind, but they are simply the by- products of our neurobiological response to the environment.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: People seek light in the external darkness Not knowing that the Light is within.Close your physical eyes and see with your inner vision.Open your eyes and see what before was invisible to you.
author: Raphael Zernoff

quote: You must have hope in a better future and have faith in this hope. But then you must forget your hope and focus on this moment now.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: We are only able to get into the possession of Wisdom and get closer to Truth when and if we realize that all the knowledge and experience concentrated in the mind only hamper us in our awakening to Truth.
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: If you want to see, then begin to see how you see.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: We are treated exactly the way we expect to be treated by the world and its people.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: It is often the simple daily practices that influence our lives in dramatic ways.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Once properly aligned with your mate everything will happen naturally. If you are alive and breathing, you are very capable of experiencing cosmic connectivity with explosive intimacy.
author: Shalom Melchizedek

quote: When you understand sex is energetic you know that the act is a merger of energy bodies, it’s a merger of consciousness, it connects you both beyond the body.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: The cerebral cortex, the outer ‘skin’ of the brain, contains as many as ten billion neurons. This complexity is daunting. Yet it is out of complex interactions between the billions of neurons that consciousness arises.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: ​The human brain creates everything that you are.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Satan's despair is absolute because Satan, as pure spirit, is pure consciousness, and for Satan (and all men in his predicament) every increase in consciousness is an increase in despair.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Combine your calling with your passion to achieve great results
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Belief is not a luxury, it is a biological necessity of the mind.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Mantra science deals with power of words, thought vibrations, concentrations, visualization, manifestation, with the structure of mind, matter, energy, consciousness and the interactions between the fundamental constituents of the observable universe and the beyond.
author: Amit Ray

quote: Once you know, you know nothing. Nothing can stop you from being you. Rare beautiful human being. Please don't stop being you.
author: Andrew Edward Lucier

quote: Through transcendence of duality, we foster greater unity in our lives, which brings about inner peace and the sprouting of unconditional LOVE.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Everyday conscious awareness of a human being is only the tip of an iceberg, underneath which there is a realm of relatively uncharted apparently mysterious processes, which are likely to be way more complex than the usual waking state.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Unconscious masses are puppets; their fate is determined by the crafty powers outside the mass! Conscious masses are composed of people of strong personality; their fate is determined by themselves!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: So much time spent believingwe had ghosts in our machines has accustomed us to hauntingourselves.
author: D.J. MacLennan

quote: We are each responsible for our own emotional well being.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: It is spiritually beneficial to understand that if we can first accept what is happening at any moment we will experience more harmony within ourselves as a human being.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: The mind is an instrument made up of universal consciousness, egocentric consciousness, societal consciousness, along with education, values, virtues, judgment and wisdom.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Spirituality, sexuality and curiosity are the three pillars of Modern Human Consciousness.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Through you, I see me. Through me, I see you.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: Get to know who you are not, because when you know your ego the Truth of who you are will also become clear.
author: Maria Erving

quote: t can be easily argued that all living things are conscious in some aspect, but many would agree that advanced consciousness like our own is unique.
author: Kat Lahr

quote: It's time for everybody to start becoming conscious of their conscience.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: There's a thin boundary between the light and dark side. Both are fervent to reign in the space of the other.
author: Gloria D. Gonsalves

quote: Ego is the central figure of our personal history, based upon the past and looking into the future. Ego is the deepest dream of the Consciousness.
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: You are consciousness within your body and mind
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: As it is, the vital question you should be asking is not what I am, but what you yourself are.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: The Intelligence of Mathematics existed first before the Intelligence of the Mind.
author: Joey Lawsin

quote: Bravery is the choice to show up and listen to another person, be it a loved one or perceived foe, even when it is uncomfortable, painful, or the last thing you want to do.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: A scientist first has to presuppose any theory based on available relevant data. In terms of such presupposition, a scientist begins his journey of scientific exploration as a philosopher.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Live consciously in the moment and experience the unity of life within you, through you and around you.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: I carry out sun rituals on the slopes of high mountains. But I am also taboo for myself, untouchable because forbidden.
author: Clarice Lispector

quote: I'm the bridge jumping friend parents warned you about.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: Remember seeker, our earthly perceptions of reality are just an illusion.
author: Earthschool Harmony

quote: It's plain to see for those who will to see from within and how common and strange things really seem to be when you start to change your planes of perception.As change in the mind persist, so shall change in thoughts, words, and deeds assist.
author: Jose R. Coronado

quote: We can only save ourselves through elevating our individual consciousness, by realizing there is already completeness within, and exercising as much considerate independence, respect and fairness as is possible.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Your calling is in what you often think about
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If your mind can move mountainsand swallow gods,Why does it worry with helpless yesterdays and unborn tomorrows?If it can vomit starsand walk on split hairs,Why must it follow the samepath to despair?Everyone will tell you:'An orgasm here is just as good.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The activity of loving kindness is the bridge that allows you to slowly, slowly realise the wisdom and perfection of this moment.
author: Tony Samara

quote: You being in your flow helps the rest of us fall into ours.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: The more a person is united within himself or herself and inwardly simple, the more and higher things he or she understands, because he or she receives the light of understanding from within.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: What was bright and exciting becomes weary, flat, and unprofitable.
author: William James

quote: The essence of this moment is your true self or we can simplify this by saying the now is a reflection of you. A person will never be able to experience the simplicity within this moment when it is not observed truthfully.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: People arguing over if the earth has it’s own organic life or not is like twins on a womb arguing their mother has a life or not.
author: Saroj Aryal

quote: Are you aiming for perfection or happiness?
author: Susanna Mittermaier

quote: If you can love one person, you can love everyone.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: After all, it isn't the facts of one's environment, but one's attitude toward them, that determines whether one will be defeated or victorious.
author: David Hawkins

quote: The one great art is that of making a complete human being of oneself.
author: G.I. Gurdjieff

quote: ...there is much more to matter than modern science currently would like to acknowledge. By developing insights about the observer, we can describe matter in a new way.
author: Ashish Dalela

quote: The principal aim of a vision quest is to ‘see’ a spirit animal that will become the quester’s animal-helper and source of his power.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Success comes to those who are aware of failure but are success conscious
author: Seyi Ayoola

quote: Everything we perceive to be solid and static is made up of almost entirely empty space.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: Our every thought reflects our level of awareness, consciousness, and love for this amazing world that we call home.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The higher consciousness are the ones who get the most pain.
author: Denny Morales

quote: At each moment new levels of communication flow through each of us, and proper communication reconciles both perspectives.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: By studying Bhagavad-gītā, one can become a soul completely surrendered to the Supreme Lord and engage himself in pure devotional service. As the Lord takes charge, one becomes completely free from all kinds of materialistic endeavors.
author: A. C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada

quote: P33- Oppression is domesticating. Gravest obstacle to the achievement of liberation is that oppressive reality absorbs those within it and thereby acts to submerge human beings consciousness.
author: Paulo Freire

quote: Welcome to the Temple of Today.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: Through mastering the means of perception, the promise of who you are in physical form is opened with an increasing opportunity for fulfilment.
author: Georgi Y. Johnson

quote: Illusions can and do create PHYSICAL Dis-Ease within our bodies. So it’s most important to master our thoughts, to become cognizant of what we are spending our precious mental energy on each moment of every day.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Consciousness is a state of existence where subjects are aware of their surroundings and can respond to its demands according to internal and external perceptions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You are a cosmic traveler; your body is temporary, but its essence is eternal...
author: Dave Zebian

quote: An act of mastery is mastery itself.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: JOURNEY OFCONSCIOUSNESS =BODY MIND & SOULIS ONE.IS HEALED.IS LOVE.
author: Nara Inneres Gold

quote: I am beautiful, one with cosmos, life force, eternal abundance, joy, vitality, infinite consciousness.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: When we are honest with ourselves it’s an opportunity to recognize and disconnect from a false narrative we have aligned with and realign to our pure nature of love.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Consciousness is only possible through change; change is only possible through movement.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: And we have the tools. We have the tools to choose. They are free, and within you now! It is the tool of conscious thought. Imagine your life and how it could be better if you used the power of conscious thought effectively?
author: Tony Curl

quote: Your self-image tells about what you think about yourself and how you appear to yourself in your own consciousness. Self-image is the picture of yourself carried in your own mind. That picture can scare you or inspire you!
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: A sense of logic causes an understanding to true sensitivity in a sensational sense, amuse the realm of celestial essence. Pleasantly speaking, it brings pleasure to see a fleshly man become a supreme god in He.
author: Jose R. Coronado

quote: It’s quite a funny law in god’s kingdom, meekness is strength.
author: Saroj Aryal

quote: Regardless of all our pretenses, deep within, we are still unconsciously the same old cave-people.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Philosophers, Poets and Fools have similar Consciousness
author: Amit Gupta

quote: The nature of consciousness is to point beyond itself. It is a tending toward or pointing to... Since consciousness points beyond itself, it is in its very being a self-transcendence.
author: William Barrett

quote: There is nothing like fear to complicate one's consciousness, inducing previously unknown levels of reflection
author: Thomas Ligotti

quote: Every emotion in the human spectrum is actually a teacher that is here to show us the degree in which we are either resisting life or flowing with life.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Kwa nini Biblia imejaa mafumbo? Biblia imejaa mafumbo kwa sababu akili za watu bado hazijakomaa kuupokea ukweli. Yesu na waandishi wote wa Biblia waliongea na kuandika kimafumbo, ili Neno la Mungu lijidhihirishe lenyewe kiroho katika mawazo ya mtu.
author: Enock Maregesi

quote: Faith is a natural evolutionary trait of the human mind, selected by Mother Nature as an internal coping-mechanism.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Mind is everything, there is nothing else as far as your subjective reality is concerned. Everything else outside this subjective reality is irrelevant to biological life.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: A stream of thoughts flows through one’s mind at a sacred-time.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A being with no faith in the human self is a being with no spirit of life, regardless of how many Fathers or Holy Spirits or Sons it believes in.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: The mind must be an open door to empty space.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: We all woke up this morning and we had with it the amazing return of our conscious mind. We recovered minds with a complete sense of self and a complete sense of our own existence — yet we hardly ever pause to consider this wonder.
author: Antonio Damasio

quote: When you rewire your consciousness to see things for what they really are, rather than seeing them through false lens influenced by outside factors, you are allowing yourself to bear witness.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Consciousness is the essence and evidence of life. Without consciousness, how can there be life?
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you could observe every thought in your brain the magnitude of it's vastness would drive you insane.
author: Stanley Victor Paskavich

quote: As consciousness expands, so does perception of self.
author: Erin Fall Haskell

quote: The conclusion of many of the scientists on the Earth that consciousness is not involved in the expanding of the physical universe after what they call the Big Bang is an illusion, by Hadien.
author: Jozef Simkovic

quote: On the table of consciousness, don't pick up the sugar-coated or well-seasoned lies by mistake. The truth has natural flavors.
author: Jeffrey G. Duarte

quote: Moments of splendor and moments of gloom – they help maintain life’s balance. One thought is key: they all pass...
author: Joan Marques

quote: Life is not an equation to be solved; it is an adventure of consciousness to be thrilled and enjoyed.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Primary consciousness is a state of being aware of things in the world – of having mental images in the present.But it is not accompanied by any sense of a person with a past and future…
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: To the ego, love is poison.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: The illusion, as ego suggests, is that it's about time - mechanical mind; it is not. It is, however, all about conscious space - something [the] soul has always known.
author: T.F. Hodge
