quote: We are all teachers, we all have knowledge and experiences that can teach others.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: The ability to be intense in whatever you do is a key factor in reclaiming your lost years
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To understand and be understood is to be at peace
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: As long as you're not hurting anyone or anything, including your future self, do only that which makes you happy.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Your heart is the roots to God.Your heart is nourished by truth, by God, but you have forgotten the heart.Come back to the heart, and you will be able to know the truth.You will be able to know the truth as the truth and the false as the false.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: The religious and scholarly alike arrive at conclusions as to Jesus’ nature based on the world-view they hold, the belief structure that shapes their interpretation. Inaccurate views of the function of reality can only lead to erroneous conclusions.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Enlightenment is tuning our consciousness to music of the universe.
author: Amit Ray

quote: We read in bed because reading is halfway between life and dreaming, our own consciousness in someone else's mind.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: Suffering occurs when love's two hands pull your soul in two directions.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: The Heart of what you are is not your body or your thoughts but pure Consciousness itself.
author: J.M. Harrison

quote: Between the poles of the conscious and the unconscious, there has the mind made a swing:Thereon hang all beings and all worlds, and that swing never ceases its sway. (pg. 16)
author: Kabir

quote: ​Consciousness is simple, if you are bold enough to accept it as simple.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Juggernaut of ignorance marauds the voices of wisdom. That explains the ultra anxious, subconsciously depressed minds trying to justify their irascible behaviour. Thus, unsettling the collective consciousness before they justify their aggressive view points.
author: Amitav Chowdhury

quote: Even this is paradoxical because even though the ego does all the spiritual practice in the beginning,it’s the Truth that has orchestrated it all.
author: Maria Erving

quote: Do you really want to hold onto empty things? We don’t have to give anything up. They just need transforming. A thousand years of happiness would be much better than another thousand years of tears, don’t you think?
author: Donna Goddard

quote: Consciousness may be seen as the haughty and restless second cousin of morphology. Memory is its mistress, perception its somewhat abused wife, logic its housekeeper, and language its poorly paid secretary
author: Gerald Edelman

quote: While scholarly research provides extensive information, the real Jesus, the man who voiced various timeless insights on life, can only be revealed when life is understood better than the common mindset of our time allows.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: As a result, your subconscious mind will do its best to keep you from a successful marriage, because you have a disagreement between your consciousness and sub consciousness
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Thinking is learning all over again how to see, directing one's consciousness, making of every image a privileged place.
author: Albert Camus

quote: It doesn't matter what you think about consciousness, higher truths, or different dimensions - it's what you do and what you are that counts.
author: Belsebuub

quote: You can go everywhere, but in the end you run back into yourself.
author: Constance A. Dunn

quote: Reality is but several levels of consciousness that can be accepted or dismissed depending on what one perceives.
author: Lauren Lola

quote: Consciousness has no units. We can say it is like a fluid or gas, but without quantification, by Starman.
author: Jozef Simkovic

quote: Get to know the master within you. Fall at the feet of your Self.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: The Temple shall house you with confidence and peace. It's a fourth dimension type f peace where nothing rot & thieves can't break in; it's the Kingdom of Heaven on earth for those who seek from within.
author: Jose R. Coronado

quote: Only by changing the state of consciousness can we change mankind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Consciousness cannot be accounted for in physical terms. For consciousness is absolutely fundamental. It cannot be accounted for in terms of anything else.
author: Erwin Schrödinger

quote: What folly takes light through ether to each eye from every horizon.
author: Scarlett Thomas

quote: Belief is made up of the same non-substance of which we ourselves are composed. The test of any belief system, then, is the degree to which this same light is permitted to shine through.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: To the extent to which your consciousness is limited or expanded, is the extent to which you experience being divided or divine.
author: Erin Fal Haskell

quote: For the mind, there is no true separation from God. Even though it looks like you are separated, you are always connected. God or Consciousness is always a whole, it is One. In manifestation, you create Many.
author: Jozef Simkovic

quote: We often try to force the experience we want to have, instead of allowing the experience we were meant to have, and in doing this, we miss out on gaining any new insight or understanding.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: Learning English was like lifting a veil, one which would be, he'd learn, impossible to fully restore.
author: Glenn Diaz

quote: Perfection itself is not the ultimate goalbut the ultimate condition of life.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: The beast lives unhistorically; for it 'goes into' the present, like a number, without leaving any curious remainder.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Remember to forget yourself
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The sweetness of adversity: we develop the sanity of solitude.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Luna is really the mother of the Sun, which means, psychologically, that the unconscious is pregnant with consciousness and gives birth to it.
author: Carl Gustav Jung

quote: Consciousness is a result of environment. Our cognitions -- our idea of reality—are shaped by what we can perceive, by the limitations of our senses. We think we’re seeing the world as it really is, but… it’s all just shadows on the cave’s wall.
author: Blake Crouch

quote: We cannot dim another person’s light without first extinguishing our own.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: To be productive, you have to stop being absent-minded
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: We are beasts, you know, beasts risen from the savannas and jungles and forests. We have come down from the trees and up out of the water, but you can never, ever fully remove the feral nature from our psyches.
author: Yasmine Galenorn

quote: As an author who writes motivated with elevated consciousness in humanitarian interests, I believe life application and guidance given should always start and finish with self.
author: Tracey Bond

quote: The only difference between holding one god as exclusive or supreme and believing in many gods specialized in function is the number.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: There is nothing wrong with you... Life isn't supposed to be easy... It is designed to be challenging so that you will grow into a more conscious, loving human being.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: Two things are needed to raise awareness: education and love. And these go hand in hand because we can be taught to love.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Do you know what you get when you try to escape? When you drive for miles in a deserted city or swim for hours in a shoreless sea? You get yourself.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Beauty is the manifestation of love.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The closer you come to knowing that you alone create the world of your experience, the more vital it becomes for you to discover just who is doing the creating.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Every sexual encounter is a partnership and agreement to exchange energies and information. The energies and information sent from ourselves to another depend on our level of inner work.
author: Shalom Melchizedek

quote: The human has not one but two births – first, when a person is born from the mother’s womb, and second, when that person rises from the socio-culturally imposed cocoon of prejudices and ignorance.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: ...definitely believe that, there's got to be a spark to a place...to make it feel like a home...
author: Isabella koldras

quote: When someone studies well, has a successful career, or deals with difficulties well, people think he is a wise man. However, such successes do not mean that one is wise. True wisdom is to know with the consciousness of God.
author: Woo Myung

quote: The most fundamental exercise is self-observation, which is the catalyst for inner change, it will give self-knowledge and a clear mind and perception. Without it, the attempt to reach enlightenment and awaken consciousness is destined to fail.
author: Belsebuub

quote: In the process of becoming conscious beings, we eventually come back around again and again to the ideas of compassion, caring, and empathy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: If you are not living in active consciousness, you will always be lost
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Integrity is the recognition of the fact that you cannot fake your consciousness, just as honesty is the recognition of the fact that you cannot fake existence.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: The teacher should be like the conductor in the orchestra, not the trainer in the circus.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: In the course of our Journey we need to realize that we do not need to become anything, because we are already in possession of the characteristics that we have been looking for so far, pursuing an image projected into the future.
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: Some people spend their whole lives seeking heaven, when all they needed to do was look about them, and embrace that which was already there.
author: Tom Althouse

quote: Normal waking consciousness feels perfectly transparent, and yet it is less a window on reality than the product of our imaginations-a kind of controlled hallucination.
author: Michael Pollan

quote: When we are in touch with our creativity, through passion and excitement, we always put ourselves in the most expansive state of consciousness. Fear slows down our development, while love supports a rapid growth.
author: Raphael Zernoff

quote: You realize that there is no free will in what we create with AI. Everything functions within rules andparameters
author: Clyde DeSouza

quote: Be strategic and purposeful in whatever you do
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Only if we live consciously, we can die consciously.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: How shall we go to sleep and wake up when we have no intention of sleeping or waking?
author: Sahar Tawfiq

quote: Our mistakes rewire our brain and open up new gateways of perception.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: When humanity stops confusing the construct with the Kingdom - we'll begin to recognize the Truth.
author: Dana Gore

quote: Consciousness is a mystery that faces the mystery of potential and transforms it into actuality. We do that with every choice we make. Our choices determine the destiny of the world. By making a choice, you alter the structure of reality
author: Jordan Petersen

quote: In the words of Lynne McTaggart: "Living consciousness somehow is the influence that turns the possibility of something into something real. The most essential ingredient in creating our universe is the consciousness that observes it.
author: Dan Brown

quote: The lover drinksand the cup-bearer pours.The lover thinksbut the cup-bearer knows:love begets love.Since this wine is love,then this cup is love,then this tavern is love,then this life is love.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: You have to be purposeful and intense to reclaim your lost years
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Find 'I Am' in you. Lead the blind to the truth. This is truly true to be for it is the Kingdom above all kingdoms.It is not as far as you think. As you think, you'll know but let the thought grow from the character of a man to his values.
author: Jose R. Coronado

quote: Simply put, the relative age of a philosophical perspective has nothing to do with its veracity. It is pure illusion to imagine that just because a view of life was held and put to words long ago, that it is more valid.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: You are absolutely and completely healthy and everyone around you is healthy. And the World is eternal. And all events are creative. And always you see everything only in positive light. And everything around is favorable. - Methods of Concentration, 2001
author: Grigori Grabovoi

quote: As above in consciousness, so below in matter
author: Michael Sharp

quote: Every thing—every atom is conscious. To find it we have to open our eyes and see with a higher consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The most valuable gift you can give yourself is the gift of knowing who you are, with that knowingness comes an understanding and awareness of what it is that you want to experience.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: You think you're losing your mind, but do keep in mind, as long as you may, that the ability to go on thinking such a thing means it's not all gone.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Christ consciousness means a sky which has no boundaries.
author: Osho

quote: There are pockets of time, she thinks, where every sense rings like a bell, where the world brims with fleeting grace.
author: Dominic Smith

quote: People tend to romanticise consciousness, as if it’s something spiritual. It’s just a word we use to describe complexity.
author: David  Walton

quote: Consciousness is like cyberspace, it is there where we can keep all of our information. We can find it if we know the codes. We can grow our consciousness as we grow cyberspace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: He does. Otherwise you could not have asked the question, and I could not have answered.
author: Scott Adams

quote: If you feel like you don't fit into the world you inherited it is because you were born to help create a new one.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: You think the thing you call consciousness is some mysterious gift from the heavens, but in the end consciousness is nothing but the context in which your thinking occurs. Consciousness is the feel of accessing memory.
author: Bernard Beckett

quote: The purpose of life is to reach a point where you can say 'yes' to all of it.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Every loving word and action create a far reaching ripple effect - like the waves of the ocean.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Feeds and streams contribute to the fracturing of our consciousness.
author: Tom Sweterlitsch

quote: No purpose is served in blaming others to whitewash your own shortcomings.
author: Prof. Basu Mali

quote: Destiny' is the state of perfect mechanical causation in which everything is the consequence of everything else. If choice is an illusion, what's life? Consciousness without volition. We'd all be passengers, no more real than model trains.
author: Nick Harkaway

quote: Our instrumental part in the symphony of life is to allow love to create a space within our own awareness, through which the undreamed mystery may emerge as a knowable reality.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Consciousness is a mystery that faces the mystery of potential and transforms it into actuality. We do that with every choice we make. Our choices determine the destiny of the world. By making a choice, you alter the structure of reality
author: Jordan Peterson

quote: The instruments needed for the song of life are always there and will play the song that you wish to hear. You decide, through active participation, what will be heard.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: Wonderment shared is doubled.Love shared is infinite.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: How simplified human history becomes, when we view it in terms of consciousness development. The real movers and shakers of our species have all been on the same journey - the journey of consciousness development.
author: Jakeb Brock

quote: Consciousness is the awareness of the interaction and interdependence among mind, body, spirit, and the universe where it resides.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everything in the universe is nothing but consciousness. Which makes us all ONE!
author: Abhishek Kumar

quote: What is your heart worth to you? The answer is ‘everything’. Our hearts are worth the World.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Through me, I see you. Through you, I see me.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: Whatever comes to your consciousness is what you act out.
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The illusion is we are only physical.
author: Vanna Bonta

quote: Consciousness is a transformational dynamic force which transforms us by changing our imaginations and perceptions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Synchronicity - the sense of significance beyond chance
author: Elisabeth Y. Fitzhugh

quote: Change happens for youthe moment you want somethingmore than you fear it.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: A conscious human is driven by their conscience, not popular opinion.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Blindly believing something often comes from societal conformity which is a sign of a lack of deep knowledge and imaginative consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When a man is penalized for honesty he learns to lie.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Humans are lamentably insecure creatures.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: If you look deeper into anyone's eyes, you will see yourself.
author: Bert McCoy

quote: Life’s product should be made intentionally and consciously
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Consciousness makes you an unlimited being by giving the power of your imagination.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: First and most importantly, death is just the absence of life—oh, and for human beings, the absence of consciousness, too, but not just the absence of consciousness, the absence of the capacity for consciousness.
author: Charles Stross

quote: The only differences between a cult and a religion are the numbers of adherents and the degree to which they are marginalized by the rest of society.
author: Sam Harris

quote: When we live with Integrity every word, thought and action springs from the Intelligence of the Heart and flows in harmony, enlightened by the pure light of Consciousness.
author: Human Angels

quote: God is not a person, God is the underlying consciousness in Existence.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Universe is one consciousness. Our life, intellect, feelings and experiences are the baubles in that ocean.
author: Amit Ray

quote: Your spiritual heart imbibes in the primordial light and, as you dance towards infinity, you begin to see all things are held together by the power of love.
author: Earthschool Harmony

quote: How I wished during those sleepless hours that I belonged to a different nation, or better still, to none at all.
author: Winfried Georg Sebald

quote: With every increase in the degree of consciousness, and in proportion to that increase, the intensity of despair increases: the more consciousness the more intense the despair.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Regardless of what you believe in or conceive of as the functionality of Reality, the Oneness of you with all you experience in your life is an absolute
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: According to Martindale’s view, as we drift into sleep we pass through: – waking, problem-oriented thought, – realistic fantasy, – autistic fantasy, – reverie, – hypnagogic (falling asleep) states, and – dreaming.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: One does not become enlightened by imagining figures of light, but by making the darkness conscious. The latter procedure, however, is disagreeable and therefore not popular.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: The pinnacle of human consciousness must be the rejection of unhealthy competition, war and violence.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Perception of reality emerges from the brain and dissolves in the brain.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Going beyond our ordinary concept of self is what always brings us the greatest sense of joy in life. Going beyond our own boundaries brings us an ecstatic awareness of how we are truly created in connection with all that is.
author: Cynthia Sue Larson

quote: You ought to stop everything and write the sacred-words as its flashes in your mind.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Truth is not fully explosive, but purely electric. You don't blow the world up with the truth; you shock it into motion.
author: Criss Jami

quote: The hardest thing in the world is to let go of who you once thought you were and to manifest your true self, at the risk of being unloved. This is self-actualization.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The awareness that seeks to know is the very object of its own seeking.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: I believe dreams connect us to our ancestors and it is through creativity that we can tap into this in the conscious state. Creativity is a sort of trance that we have as artists that erases time and space.
author: Lorin Morgan-Richards

quote: To find out what is truly individual in ourselves, profound reflection is needed; and suddenly we realize how uncommonly difficult the discovery of individuality is.
author: C.G. Jung

quote: Spre deosebire de inconştient şi preconştient conştientul are un rol benefic asupra psihicului nostru, dar mai cu seamă asupra salvării sufletelor noastre.
author: Nicu Nicolaescu

quote: Passion Has No Paperwork
author: Ellis Mnyandu

quote: Meditation is the dissolution of thoughts in Eternal awareness or Pure consciousness without objectification, knowing without thinking, merging finitude in infinity.
author: Voltaire

quote: The concept of a Miracle, that is, an event that takes place somehow beyond the scope of functional Reality, is absurd. . . There cannot be a true miracle. There can only be events that appear miraculous when you don’t really understand How Life Works.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Doing philosophy is only a threefold or double kind of waking--being awake--consciousness.
author: Novalis

quote: Growth of consciousness does not depend on the might of the intellect but on the conviction of the heart.
author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quote: The Kingdom of God is an earthly experience which manifests in an unearthly manner.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: You encounter, at its core, a subjective Reality, one based on meaning and value reflective of your own Self, not an objective universe, cold, particle-based and indifferent as science projects.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Artificial Intelligence can be a supplement to human insight, not substitute.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: So life does flow, but not from left to right on a time scale, rather frominside out.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Every breath away from the awareness of the present moment is a step away from the Self.
author: Joseph Cyrus

quote: Love is our religion. Love is our light. It is the only thing that gives us any hope.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The universe is eager to kindle in you experiences that will enhance and enlighten your consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When we ge closer to the divine, benediction starts happening. When we go away from the divine, benediction starts disappearing.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: (...) we should strive to grow consciousnessitself — to generate bigger, brighter lights in an otherwise dark universe.
author: Giulio Tononi

quote: Good and evil are both fundamental features of the human mind.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Your true being, as Consciousness, is ever at peace, ever at rest, eternally existing in the dimension of here and now. It is the formless and eternal quality within you that expresses itself through the world of form.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: We must grow out of this ground surrounding our minds and branch ourselves out into the reality that bears the fruits of heaven
author: Ilwaad Isa

quote: We live in an energy-responsive world where intention radiates throughout. Fundamental to everything is attitude and perception
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: The Buddha achieved enlightenment while meditating under a tree. To what extent did the tree's being contribute to the Buddha's shift of consciousness?
author: Melina Sempill Watts

quote: Ignite your fire of consciousness. Now invite others to contribute their fires to create a massive light of knowledge.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everything with no exception is a choice. The choice can be either conscious or unconscious depending on the level of self-awareness. The more self-aware we become, the faster we can make our unconscious choices known to us.
author: Raphael zernoff

quote: The totally alive, totally conscious, and totally aware Universe takes care of itself completely. It is totally self-reliant and totally self- sufficient. it is perfect.
author: Chris Prentiss

quote: Every time life calls to us, it is the voice of God and the voice of our very hearts. When we listen, we thrive. When we don't, we do what we must to survive.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: An enlightened person raises the level of the consciousness of the entire community.
author: Phyllis Theroux

quote: Waking consciousness is dreaming – but dreaming constrained by external reality
author: Oliver Sacks

quote: There is no higher consciousness. There are just different ways of perceiving things.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Human kind gradually begins to remove the blinders from their consciousness about life, about what is real and what is not. Intuition and psychic abilities increase.
author: Elaine Seiler

quote: The blessing of resistance lies in its power to illuminate those aspects of ourselves which have eluded our appreciation.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Complexes and negative beliefs remain in our sub consciousness for a life time
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If we feel good, we can keep going in the direction of the reality we’re creating. If we don’t feel good, we may reflect upon our beliefs and change them according to the reality we do wish to create.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: If you look deeply into anyone's eyes, you will find yourself.
author: Bert McCoy

quote: Our quest for love in the 21st century is stronger than ever. All over the world, people active in all sectors of the economy, from all layers in society, are longing for the return of the human being.
author: Ivo Valkenburg

quote: Whatever is what you are creating is what creates you.
author: Ana Ortega

quote: Your calling is concealed in you and has to be discovered by you alone
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: [Some scientific] experiments…tell us that what we consider the objective world depends in some measure on our own conscious processes. There is no fixed eternal reality……… true understanding is not to be achieved with the rational mind.
author: Larry Dossey

quote: Still your mind and become a witness to your thoughts through meditation. The more you do this, you open gaps of "no mind" which puts you in a very open, present state of consciousness whereby YOU become more awakened, more aware & more powerful!
author: Sanjo Jendayi

quote: It is common for many individuals to enter into a relationship and get so consumed with trying to figure it out that they lose touch with their primary relationship, the relationship they have with their self.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: In a country of ideas, consciousness is its' citizen.
author: Toba Beta

quote: When we convene a group for gender healing and reconciliation, we are collectively taking similar action. We stretch ourselves to a larger consciousness and grace that is beyond our capacity, but within our reach.
author: William Keepin

quote: Sleeping is not a loss of consciousness, but it is a temporary loss of integration of awareness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I believe the universe wants to be noticed. I think the universe is improbably biased toward the consciousness, that it rewards intelligence in part because the universe enjoys its elegance being observed.
author: John Green

quote: The Spirit is as much a jealous lover as the ego. Both guard their path with an uncompromising passion but for very different reasons.
author: Donna Goddard

quote: The meaning of Sannyas is not well defined. Its meaning is not static; it is redefined after short periods of time in the life of a Sannyasi.
author: Harshit Walia

quote: No one can give you freedom or set you free until you change your awareness and consciousness and break the walls of conformity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The case for interconnectedness between conscious human lives is hard to deny.
author: Kat Lahr

quote: Without thoughts the mind cannot exist only consciousness
author: Avis Williams

quote: Love is the highest form of meditation.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Humanity has pondered over the meaning of God since its beginning. It is one of those cognitive features that came along with the advent of modern Human Consciousness.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Each and every one of us is absolutely complete. We all contain both masculine and feminine polarities. No-thing can exist incomplete. You can only love another appropriately when you understand your own completeness.
author: Shalom Melchizedek

quote: There exists only a mechanism by which meaning flows from intangible mind element into real event – and when you see that, all the postulated structures and cosmologies, built only of concepts, dissipate like yesterday’s weather.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: The doctrine of waiting for confirmation is one of the greatest time killers
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: ... And when the time comes to choose yet another dream, I shall smile knowing that I had a life with no less challenges than others, but I chose to respond to them with love.
author: Raphael Zernoff

quote: It is always now
author: Sam Harris

quote: Our evolution depends on our memory. If we keep forgetting the mistakes of the past, only to keep repeating them, then we will never change. Humanity will never move forward, spiritually or morally, to become superior beings.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Each of your brains creates its own myth about the universe.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Until you see beauty everywhere, in every face, until then, you are blind.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: If you are in manifested matter, you must include consciousness; you cannot ignore its existence. If you are here where I am, you must understand the manifested Universe. And, many here don’t understand that world of yours, by Gardener.
author: Jozef Simkovic

quote: Life isn't memorable enough to remember everything. It's not like there are explosions all the time, or dog smoking cigarettes.
author: Donald Miller

quote: The impression she left on others and her self-perception had been sewn into a whole so consummate that she could no longer tell how much of each day was defined by what was wished upon her and how much of it was what she really wanted.--Three Daughters of Eve.
author: Elif Shafak

quote: The shortest interval between two points is the awareness that they are not two.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: All of life is a ceremony where we get to know and explore our wholeness.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: We're so afraid of being hurt that we become the abuser first.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Josephus is the first historian to make note of Jesus having even existed – and that happened six full decades after his death.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: If one could amputate part of one's consciousness...
author: Susan Sontag

quote: To be full of being is to live as a body-soul. One name for the experience of full being is joy.
author: J.M. Coetzee

quote: To be a full lover is to become a healer to yourself and then help another heal their self.
author: Shalom Melchizedek

quote: It is interesting that we know how the world and the planetary systems work, but we don’t know how we think and why we are conscious.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Humanity is completely consumed with the pleasures of the flesh; we have been self-programmed to lose consciousness of the soul.
author: Felix Wantang

quote: The soul of the Universe awaits to enfold you in pure white light.
author: Earthschool Harmony

quote: In Your Early Years people Tell You, Correct You and Forgive You. But when you become an Adult, they Neither Correct you nor Forgive You
author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

quote: There is obviously only one alternative, namely the unification of minds or consciousnesses. Their multiplicity is only apparent, in truth there is only one mind.
author: Erwin Schrödinger

quote: The way to Bliss is through Understanding, through Wisdom.
author: Tony Samara

quote: It is not enough to just be in a relationship that is aimlessly moving forward, you must be aware of which direction the relationship is moving and be an active participant in the development, unfolding, and growth of the relationship.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Religions take hold and dominate a culture, not because they accurately portray reality, but because they appear to, once having been accepted – such that succeeding generations are heavily indoctrinated into the shared cultural mindset from birth.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: What drains your spirit drains your body. What fuels your spirit fuels your body.
author: Carolyn Myss

quote: Things aren’t brought to light because of the illusion of fear and we don’t want to shatter the illusion because we can go on living within multiple realities, where we can unfairly hold someone to anexpectation they are unaware of.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: If on any given day you don't cry from rejoicing in the beauty of the world, then you have not lived that day.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: It is important to know what you don't want.
author: Amitav Chowdhury

quote: Every single decision of your life is predicated on the healthy functioning of the prefrontal cortex. Even a slight malfunction in a tiny chunk of neuron anywhere in the PFC would lead to the mental deficit in your logical decision-making.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: When we allow ourselves to be authentically free, it raises our vibration.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: You can’t really think hard about what you’re doing and listen to the radio at the same time. Maybe they didn’t see their job as having anything to do with hard thought, just wrench twiddling.
author: Robert M. Pirsig

quote: We cannot tell that we are constantly splitting into duplicate selves because our consciousness rides smoothly along only one path in the endlessly forking chains
author: Martin Gardner

quote: Cosmic consciousness is the next level of holistic perception.
author: Laurie Nadel

quote: When I was a kid my mom would send me off to school each day with the words, ‘Remember: be happy! The most important thing today is that you are happy!
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: You are someone.
author: Ana Ortega

quote: It is impossible for a man to think of something without matching his abstract idea with physical object.
author: Joey Lawsin

quote: What we call consciousness is our ability to perceive stimuli and to file it within the parameters of our personal story.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: You never saw an angel, because they don’t exist – at least not in this Reality. They do exist in the realm of imagination – but then, just about anything can be conjured up there in a mind steeped in myth and lore.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: When, and only when, you clearly see the inner roots to an outer condition, can you change them and thus it.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: If you have the desire to change your life, your circumstances, your perspectives, hold fast to your inner commitments and listen to your inner knowing.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: What if fighting was no longer your first answer but change is?
author: Susanna Mittermaier

quote: We may talk lightly but never carelessly. We keep at bay the flow of common, ignorant thought which runs its damaging course through the pathways of ordinary human conversation.
author: Donna Goddard

quote: I am higher consciousness.
author: Bert McCoy

quote: Be YOU. There is nothing sexier than someone who is confident enough to be themselves, quirks and all. It is often your unique nature that separates you from the crowd in the best way possible for your romantic match to notice you.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: You cannot change the past, but you can make a difference now
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: Perhaps the universe is a big fat consciousness and the matter is just an illusion.
author: Erol Ozan

quote: Good means life, this is the realization of eternal life. - FUNDAMENTAL LAWS OF THE WORLD FOR ENSURING ETERNAL LIFE, 2017
author: Grigori Grabovoi

quote: And that is very important for the thriving of a relationship. To be able to see things (w)holistically, and that requires both individuals to hear each other’s communication clearly, and for a solution then to arise and to be accepted.
author: Shalom Melchizedek

quote: Everything you have ever done has led up to this very moment. Savor your life, the lessons, the wisdom, the failures, the victories and all the relationships that have made an imprint in your journey.
author: Karen A. Baquiran

quote: I was struck by an awful thought, the kind that cannot be taken back once it escapes into the open air of consciousness; it seemed to me that this was not a place you go to live. It was a place you go to die.
author: John Green

quote: Enlightenment is not about attaining an ultimate level of intelligence or intellect. It is regained by shedding all the ideas, illusion and binds thrust on you and that you then so readily accrue.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Keep your body grounded on earth, but keep your consciousness high above the clouds
author: Tyler Hebert

quote: The majority of people in modern society feel separated—from the world, each other, and themselves. This feeling of separation is a resultfrom we humans attempting to separate ourselves from nature, and consequently forgetting who we really are.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: The level of consciousness defines the beauty of our lives.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your past karma is what you found difficult or challenging in this life. To heal your past karma you would need to learn your life lessons for this life.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: So as evolution progresses, consciousness becomes more involved in matter: living beings become a fuller expression of spirit and move closer to the source from which they, and all things, came.
author: Steve Taylor

quote: Human nature is a combination of modern conscience and ancient primitiveness. As the creation of the human mind in a state of transcendence, all scriptures are also a fusion of human conscience and gruesome primitiveness.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Discourse and critical thinking are essential tools when it comes to securing progress in a democratic society. But in the end, unity and engaged participation are what make it happen.
author: Aberjhani

quote: Kamand, die every dayso you rememberto live.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: If spiritual people are so fascinate with consciousness then why do they work so hard at being unconscious of reality?
author: Christopher Zzenn Loren

quote: I think falling in love is like discovering the magic of books. You think to yourself, 'how was I living before this?
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Just because you have a brain doesn't mean you are conscious; just because you are alive doesn't mean you have a brain.
author: Joey Lawsin

quote: This is what I had come for, just this, and nothing more. A fling of leafy motion on the cliffs, the assault of real things, living and still, with shapes and powers under the sky- this is my city, my culture, and all the world I need.
author: Annie Dillard

quote: The modern scientist attempts to step outside of himself in order to observe himself, an attempt that is always doomed to failure. You cannot make an object out of your subjective experience, but you know that consciousness exists, simply because you exist.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: We are all students of the world; frail embodied consciousnesses struggling to understand, and be a meaningful part of this great, mysterious gift of life.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: I take it as a compliment when somebody calls me crazy. I would be offended if I was one of the sheeple, one of the sleepwalkers in the matrix or part of the collective hallucination we call 'normal
author: Mohadesa Najumi

quote: Consciousness is a mystery that faces the mystery of potential and transforms it into actuality. We do that with every choice we make. Our choices determine the destiny of the world. By making a choice, you alter the structure of reality.
author: Dr Jordan B Peterson

quote: When I turn my mind's eye upon myself, I understand that I am a thing which is incomplete and dependent on another and which aspires without limit to ever greater and better things...
author: René Descartes

quote: We exist only to exist.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: A new heaven is the emergence of a transformed state of human consciousness. And A New Earth is it's direct reflection in the physical realm.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Seemingly minor yet persistent things penetrate the mind over time making it difficult to ever realize the impact; hence, though quite unfortunate, the most dangerous forms of corruption are those that are subtle and below the radar.
author: Criss Jami

quote: In the calm, deep waters of the mind, the wolf waits.
author: F.T. McKinstry

quote: Name and form are simply illusions of separation. Love doesn’t make us blind; rather, it erases the illusions so we can see clearly.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Love is the perception of perfection beyond the protection of our projection.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Until you are clear nothing will be. The moment you are clear everything will be.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: We are who we are because of what we learn and what we remember.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Peace never hurries. To rush or force is contradictory to the very essence of peace.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: The overwhelmed, unresponsive senses ravaged by agony left no option other than flailing in pain. Strangled by these things, it easily lost consciousness. Fully free of the emotions of a human who hadn't wept in ages, the body sobbed instinctively.
author: Carlo Zen

quote: Each of us is like all of us and like no one else.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: With an advanced worldview we will know and experience that the whole universe is conscious and infinitely connected and we are connected to all the cosmos and life
author: Jonathan R. Banks

quote: If there is any kernel of truth in the religions we so deplore,and they are just a carnival of errors,the truth is that it's possible to sink into the present moment in such a way as to find it sacred and to cease to have a problem.
author: Sam Harris

quote: Everything you know is a story. That’s how human consciousness works.
author: Ed Gray

quote: There are many, many, many worlds branching out at each moment you become aware of your environment and then make a choice.
author: Kevin Michel

quote: A flower blooms with all of her power and love to give you joy and to beautify this world. Is she conscious, unconscious, or super conscious?
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Dare to be vulnerable, walk outside without your armor on and say YES to your heart.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Don't seek love externally, it's fleeting. Go beyond the ego and awaken thelove that already exists within; it will encompass everyone andeverything in your life; it will permeate your very being.
author: Danielle Pierre

quote: Facts do not fall in the face of discomfort.
author: Stefan Molyneux

quote: The key to all of your behaviors is hidden in a box that you can’t open using normal tools, your subconscious needs a different recipe than the one you’ve been using.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: Loving yourself is being honest with yourself and then giving yourself the space to heal and transform.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Even then, understanding my life was nothing but an illusion. Individual parts put together could never account for all the factors of a lifetime or account for the mind and its different forms of consciousness.
author: Loubna Hassanieh

quote: The totality of your commitment will make you more efficient
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: You do not necessarily control or influence everything that is manifesting absolutely but you are accountable for observing a situation and how you respond to it. Herein is the key to enlightenment and the true essence of your divine presence in the universe.
author: Steve Leasock

quote: I will not pray for health or wealth or splendor; I will pray for a higher consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: As your consciousness, refinement and pureness of heart expands you will become less judgmental, less corrective, less reactive, less black-and-white, less critical, less apt to blame and less tormented by others and their faults and views.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Truth falls from the heavens like rain, gently carving many channels in the earth. Your truth may be different from my own, yet both are still true.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: You don’t need any confirmation if you are already in the spirit
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: To see the positive or not to see the positive, this is the question.
author: Bert McCoy

quote: Bringing light of our personal and social consciousness to dark corridors of human pain that have long been neglected and suppress.
author: William Keepin

quote: Being in the present moment, one can step outside the mechanical train of life, and this is where the inner revolution begins.
author: Belsebuub

quote: Intelligence is the capacity to know what we are doing and instinct is just instinct. The results are about the same.
author: Will Cuppy

quote: You are consciousness dressed in form, my love. Consciousness is divine. Matter is divine. Creation is divine. Everything is divine. Are you somehow the only exception?
author: Martha N. Beck

quote: You need intensity to be quick
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The most important truth we tell is the truth we tell ourselves.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: Faith is one of only two things in mankind's consciousness that defies discussion. The other is one's marriage.
author: Psyche Roxas-Mendoza

quote: It takes courage and discipline to take the steps to move forward from a relationship that is restricting your growth. When you stay in a relationship past its expiration date it eventually reaches the point of deterioration and toxicity.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: No two moments are identical in a conscious being
author: Henri Bergson

quote: An idle mind does not think.
author: Amitav Chowdhury

quote: Call it God if you wish; that's fine when you consider that, in the Hebrew sense, God means the indefinable, that which cannot be know or understood. The universal consciousness is not easy to understand, and yet we can know it.
author: Russel Williams

quote: Deep within ourselves, we find the inner being, the inner source of love, which is our true nature. Love is the only reality, because only love works.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Butcher, baker, candlestick maker – many are unaware of the true role they play in Reality.
author: Etienne de L'Amour

quote: That voice you listen to is no friend. It promises so much but when has it ever given you what it promised? When has it ever given you any happiness longer than a fleeting moment? It has your destruction as its goal, not your happiness.
author: Donna Goddard

quote: The best way to transform ourselves is by transforming our consciousness and awareness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A new consciousness has been emerging through the age of Aquarius, and a rapid spiritual awakening is occurring, which science, and organized religions have not yet fully tapped into.
author: J..J. Hughes

quote: Rock art sites were symbolic vaginas, and entry into the wall of a rock art site was thus akin to intercourse.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: I can now simply say that consciousness can be stretched out of the body like a giant piece of chewing gum without the need to have any defined diameter or length of the connection with the body - by Jozef.
author: Jozef Simkovic

quote: Time is an illusion, only the keepers of the illusion are real, and the reality they have spun, keeps us, until we set upon the path of the dream.
author: Tom Althouse

quote: Art is inextricably tied to man's survival - not to his physical survival, but to that on which his physical survival depends: to the preservation and survival of his consciousness.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Working hard is not a waste of time, but a state of mind. Keep pushing your limits until you reach the edge. Then be kind and rewind.
author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quote: I believe in the power of love, and planting positive thought seeds into the collective consciousness.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: What then am I? In the end, all we have is simply what we find, and what we can usefully say to each other about what we find is all that needs to be said. And perhaps, in the end, it's best just to sit quietly and let go of that thought too.
author: Murray Shanahan

quote: When we invoke stillness within our consciousness, we have the power to recover the child we forgot that we once were.
author: Daniel St. Clair

quote: Consciousness is a born hermit.
author: George Santayana

quote: We run after love for fear of abandonment, we run after pleasure for fear of pain; we are not made to run after something, but to live what we already are.
author: Emmanuelle Soni-Dessaigne

quote: Sure all life's highways at some point must end, so I plan to ride it in style and plummet in a swan dive when the pavement runs out...And hopefully leave behind artistically that which may make other roads an even better ride...
author: Tom Althouse

quote: What you resist, persists....Let go and your life will flow.
author: Nanette Mathews

quote: No Soul is identical – yet all Souls are unified.
author: J.M. Harrison

quote: To win or lose often depends on set parameters. Expand the bounds of what is possible, and you may come out the true winner, outside the confines of its defining.
author: Tom Althouse

quote: Compassion dissolves ignorance.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: You can not hope to arrive at harmony in your life while stirring up disturbances in anothers...
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quote: Thoughts don't become things; thoughts ARE things.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Reality, in its essence, consists not of particles interacting pointlessly in anindependent physical plane, but rather of values, psychological elements ofmind, made real.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Respect everyone who crosses your path, even if you feel they don't deserve it.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: First you must face your own reality in the present, here and now! If you fail to do that, if you do not obtain first-hand experience from it, there will be no deep, far-reaching changes in you.
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: The mind is the playing field of consciousness. The philosophy of the mind includes the ideas, rules, and essence it creates and follows in the process of living, learning, adapting, evaluating and assimilating.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Synchronicity is the soul's reminder of authorship.
author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

quote: Consciousness ("here" and "now") is not"false and misleading" because of language; consciousness is language, andnothing else, because it is false and misleading.
author: Paul De Man

quote: If awareness and conscious thought are seen as a part of life - not its master nor its opponent but an illumination of the developing process within the individual - then our total life can be the unified and unifying experience that is characteristic in nature.
author: Carl R. Rogers

quote: In deep silence, raise your consciousness. Now feel the profound joy of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Pleasure brings pain, but inner silence brings nothing negative; it is in itself of great value and is a far better way to be than to be in ego states.
author: Belsebuub

quote: The point at which things happen is a decision. In stead of focusing on yourself, focus on how you can help someone else.
author: Germany Kent

quote: Whoever has hatred toward someone is that hatred.
author: Belsebuub

quote: Beliefs and definitions never clarify how Reality works -- they only distort perception of it.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: If you are choosing to stay stuck in a relationship where you are no longer growing or the person you are in relation with is no longer growing it is important to make the decision on whether or not to change your pivot.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Consciousness precedes phenomenon, and therefore consciousness can alter phenomenon.
author: Shai Tubali

quote: How remarkable we are in our ability to hide things from ourselves - our conscious minds only a small portion of our actual minds, jellyfish floating on a vast dark sea of knowing and deciding.
author: Andrew Sean Greer

quote: Been conscious of your deficiencies helps you trust more in the Lord
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Love never ends.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: respond rather than react to situations, people or environment. Let go of limiting emotions such as fear, frustration and anger and start to express your emotions to others, this is essential to a healthy wellbeing.
author: Avis Williams

quote: Life is a dance of consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Your destiny is connected with your calling
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: There are twenty one mystical dimensions of consciousness. Enlightenment is abiding in the highest three dimensions of consciousness.
author: Amit Ray

quote: Consciousness is who we really are; thoughts, feelings, and emotions are passing and temporary, but consciousness is existence.
author: Belsebuub

quote: Because of Mother Nature, Humans become Conscious Beings.
author: Joey Lawsin

quote: Much of our suffering is caused by our false perceptions and attachment to mental images. We assume things to be true without really knowing whether they are true or not, then create a world of hurt for ourselves and others.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: The only way to follow your path is to take the lead.
author: Joe  Peterson

quote: Personal growth will cause a ripple effect as the growth in consciousness of enough people, one by one, can create general change, and lasting social improvements.
author: Bud Harris

quote: Pure consciousness is an absurdity. Consciousness never exists alone, it always comes attached to a body.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: The meaning of life is to become conscious. The whole evolution of life is to become increasingly more conscious.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: The ability to control the devil in you, defines the strength of your conscience!
author: Gunbir Singh

quote: You need to do an inventory of yourself to discover your calling and purpose
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The moment when humanity learns to tame all its primeval biases, only then it will be worth the title "Sapiens", not any earlier.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Share your light and wisdom, let it flow outwards and touch people. By raising your energy you will help others and you will also add to the awareness of the collective consciousness.
author: Ana Rangel & Gerry O'malley

quote: Once we knit biology to the canvas of consciousness, things get enough complicated already. Let alone culture, science and other conditionings layered on top of them.
author: Saroj Aryal

quote: Share your dreams and they will be inspired. Plant seeds of knowledge and they will grow and reproduce beyond measure.
author: Terry A O'Neal

quote: Of all the things that one can do spiritually, to re-merge with your soul provides the greatest benefit.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: Consciousness is everywhere, let it fill you up.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: No matter how busy we may believe we are, we have the wonderful opportunity presently of investing time with loved ones. For those are the great investments we will be glad we made, when time begins to slow and the ability to tend turns tender.
author: Tom Althouse

quote: To be able to die consciously, we need to prepare for death while we are still living.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: With every increase in the degree of consciousness, and in proportion to that increase, the intensity of despair increases: the more consciousness the more intense the despair
author: Søren Kierkegaard

quote: Physicals and Abstracts are the building blocks of Consciousness.
author: Joey Lawsin

quote: The real history of consciousness starts with one's first lie.
author: Joseph Brodsky

quote: You are born every day, until the day you finally die.
author: Amitav Chowdhury

quote: Fitting into the equation of humanity, we knead the poignancy of compassion and milk the headiness of creativity into ever more substantive knowing, pushing the collective, universal consciousness to expand moment by moment, molecule by molecule.
author: Laurie Perez

quote: This is the only truth in the world that was necessary yesterday, is necessary today, and will continue to be necessary tomorrow: be conscious of now.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Open up allowing the temporal and eternal self to dance deeper into the conversation.
author: Gillian Elizabeth

quote: In a very true sense, I have no country or nationality. I am a dance of consciousness that belongs to this universe and to eternity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Consciousness is man's greatest misfortune, still I know that man loves it and will not exchange it for any satisfactions.
author: Dostoyevsky

quote: A good man cares about others. A good man has not only selfish desires. He is not only centered in himself. A bad man has no concern for others. He has only selfish concerns. He is centered in his own world.
author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quote: Consciousness is very personal like happiness, sadness, or awareness. You can only feel it and you cannot see it. It does not follow any quantum rules. It has no weight or dimension and does not occupy any space. Consciousness has no beginning and no end.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There is almost a sensual longing for communion with others who have a large vision. The immense fulfillment of the friendship between those engaged in furthering the evolution of consciousness has a quality impossible to describe.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Time is a curious dimension - habit of the preconceived notion can easily reverse the hand of a clock, and yet the clock is still in perfect working order.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: The images of things are not the things in themselves.
author: E.L. Doctorow

quote: To observe life is not only to organize your internal and external life, but reach to the state, from where, without any effort, both your internal and external life, moves in synchronization.
author: Roshan Sharma

quote: Lessons echo until you let go.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: The greater the time of grief or stress the greater reason we have to be in alignment with peace.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: The existence of excessive nationalism is a symptom of a deeper problem in the collective consciousness, which is continually being exploited.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: Do not avert your eyes.It is important that you see this.It is important that you feelthis.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Positive thoughts, words, and actions create positive feelings. Positive feelings generate positive energy.
author: Nozer Kanga

quote: Mankind is nothing but a playground of consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: And most people who run into communication issues do not realize that they actually do not know how to properly communicate or get the transmission across properly. Communication is clear knowingness and the expression of that knowingness to another.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: …falling in love is a state of mental misery which has a restricting, impoverishing, and paralyzing effect upon the development of our consciousness.
author: José Ortega y Gasset

quote: It’s perfectly normal, perfectly natural to live in sleep. But to wake up is a revolution in consciousness. To wake up is to break free of nature. To wake up is to rise and unite with the spirit, and nature doesn’t do that for us.
author: Belsebuub

quote: In order to fall asleep we must first close our eyes and pretend to be sleeping. Can the same be true for happiness and success?
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: Some of your childhood traumas may be remembered with incredible clarity, while others are so frightening or incomprehensible that your conscious mind buries the memory in your unconscious.
author: Renee Fredrickson

quote: Awakening means you’ve come home to yourself, that consciousness shifted back to its original nature.
author: Maria Erving

quote: I am nurtured within the womb of universal consciousness. It supports my developing awareness as I witness, engage, learn, create, exchange.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: The highest level of consciousness is craziness
author: Charif J Diab

quote: A single thought can shift your entire world.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: One life force connects to the Holy other.
author: Earthschool Harmony

quote: Speed is the ability to take a decision in a few seconds
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: you know things, without knowing how you know, but you know it is true
author: Avis Williams

quote: ...if you were truly existing in a state of love with another person and the relationship somehow came to an end you would understand that no perceived love was lost because love cannot be destroyed or denatured, it is a perpetual state.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: Everyone on Earth is on Death Row until they find a way out. It’s not so hard to find the way out. The problem is wanting to.
author: Donna Goddard

quote: Love is the only reason that is reason enough
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Consciousness, unprovable by scientific standards, is forever, then, the impossible phantom in the predictable biologic machine, and your every thought a genuine supernatural event. Your every thought is a ghost, dancing.
author: Alan Moore

quote: May your sleep be your death, and your wakefulness be your heaven.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: If your idea is not against your conscience or the will of God, go for it
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: It is pretty simple - mind is a part of life - consciousness is a part of mind - God is a part of consciousness.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Be infinitely flexible and constantly amazed.
author: Jason Kravitz

quote: Always have a list of what you want to achieve in life
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: God is the ultimate ground of Being, and this ultimate ground of Being is YOU. For one who realizes their true nature as God, as Consciousness, life becomes a joy without end.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: Like any organic entity, a system of consciousness manifests itself through the orderly, differentiated development of a certain unifying reality.
author: Kitaro Nishida

quote: My Biggest Power is My Wisdom.
author: Min Somai

quote: It is not so much being all that you dream of becoming as it is un-becoming all that is covering your being.
author: Sepi

quote: The world needs gigantic strong wills in front of which even the mountains will be crumbled.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Being comfortable with the lies can be catastrophic.
author: Amitav Chowdhury

quote: When we understand that Peace is a state of mind we understand true Peace.
author: Tony Samara

quote: The attempt to escape from pain, is what creates more pain.
author: Gabor Maté

quote: Humanism is not a single character. It is a magnificent blend of various emotional and behavioral traits that are unique to the human mind.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: You are an explorer, and you represent our species, and the greatest good you can do is to bring back a new idea, because our world is endangered by the absence of good ideas. Our world is in crisis because of the absence of consciousness.
author: Terence McKenna

quote: Who are you without your labels and attachments to the issues you are passionate about? Remove the emotions, remove the beliefs and associations, and simply focus on the rational and practical applications that promote peaceful progression.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: It’s key to know if you’re currently having sex based on an ego connection or transcending your sex life into love.
author: Shalom Melchizedek

quote: It is usually unbearably painful to read a book by an author who knows way less than you do, unless the book is a novel.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: When we continue to hate, we continue to lose. When we amplify mutual respect and love, we have a lot to gain. Quite simply, there is more for us to gain through love than hate.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Rethink Your Success Mindset: Times are getting tougher. We need tougher mindsets to ensure that we go beyond survive to thrive.
author: Tony Dovale - ReThink Your Success Mindset tonydovalespeaks.com

quote: What we do not confront, we inhabit.What we do not reject, we accept.What we do not fight, we become.
author: Stefan Molyneux

quote: Conscious minds can, at the most, comprehend that the whole idea of a 'God' is his superiority, his omnipotence, omnipresence, and omniscience; and therefore, at the least, desire him, someone far greater than themselves.
author: Criss Jami

quote: The moment we accept our pain is the moment we release our suffering. Suffering is created when we offer life resistance, and what we resist most are the experiences that bring us pain.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: Love fills the infinite.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Indeed, of the major religions, Islam offers no discernible sliver of valid notion for How Life Works.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Choosing kindness is the ultimate expression of evolved consciousness. Grow by being kind.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: If you look within, so from within, out.From without, everyone else looks in.
author: Jose R. Coronado

quote: There is no such thing as divine law enforced by mankind. Cosmic laws are self-sustaining mechanisms that do not require our assistance to function.
author: Anita B. Sulser PhD

quote: Consciousness is clear; it reflects colors of the vessel.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Pay attention to your dreams; when you go on a trip, in your dreams you will still be home. Then after you've come home you'll dream of where you were. It's a kind of jet lag of the consciousness.
author: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: Reach out for, then embrace your heart consciousness.
author: Steven Redhead

quote: When once the Heart is awakened, every single moment 'in-time' is a treasure to beheld
author: AainaA-Ridtz A R

quote: Vibration can be shifted through the mastery of thought
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: His brain and his heart knew this, but he couldn’t stop himself, and the razor of his conscience lent the undeniable thrill of pain to the act.
author: Robert Girardi

quote: Aun cuando mi destino externo se haya desenvuelto como sucede para todos, inevitablemente y según lo decretado por los dioses, mi vida íntima es obra propiamente mía, con sus gozos y amarguras, y soy yo, en lo personal, el responsable de la misma.
author: Herman Hesse

quote: Your level of ignorance is based on what you believe you know and your ego.
author: Kemi Sogunle

quote: Your intensity increases your productivity
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Lucidity was a slippery thing and her hands were wet.
author: Raabe Gabriel

quote: What people instinctively regard as cool is real power - consistency. Pathetic is not cool. Being locked in a tragedy, but not knowing it. That's lameness.
author: Cory Duchesne

quote: Liberation happens each time we become conscious of the contents of the soul.
author: Michael Meade

quote: In altered states of consciousness, the nervous system itself becomes a ‘sixth sense’ that produces a variety of images including entoptic phenomena.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: The thing consciousness understands least is itself.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: There are some days we can claim and there are other days that claim us.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The path that takes us from here, to the fulfillment of our life purpose is who we are. We are the bridge to our destiny." (From the Secrets to Divine Manifestations)
author: Alain Yaovi M. Dagba

quote: Trust what is not known to your Mind. Trust what is known to your Heart.
author: Tony Samara

quote: La coscienza è la scoperta che noi non siamo, siamo un divenire ma non siamo un essere.
author: Carmelo Bene

quote: As our awareness of the world and who we are increases, we will grow to replace our needs with service, fear with love and scarcity with abundance.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: Technology offers great communication tools. Social media helps make connections. And, heart to heart conversations take place face to face and not over email, Whatsup, Facebook or Twitter. Don't be deceived.
author: Ana Ortega

quote: Shamanism is not simply a component of society: on the contrary, shamanism, together with its tiered cosmos, can be said to be the overall framework of society.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Man’s earliest prereligious fear of the natural forces gradually became religious in nature and got personalized and spiritualized. Eventually he learnt to say 'God works in a mysterious way'.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: Insecurity is the lack of trust in your abilities and worth. When you enter into a secured state of consciousness, everything that helped boost your confidence will return.
author: Itohan Eghide

quote: Enlightenment is the unfolding of the divinity within.
author: Michael Sharp.

quote: The gospels, never meant to report, butrather to convince, are in no sense objective and dispassionate biographies. They are glowing accounts meant to persuade people of the writers’ convictions.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Reach out for, then embrace your heart consciousness, tap into The Power of The Heart.
author: Steven Redhead

quote: Human beings are just a ripple in the ocean of consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you reunite with your soul, everything that you think changes and all of the pain goes away.
author: Gerard Armond Powell

quote: You are not limited to this body, to this mind, or to this reality—you are a limitless ocean of Consciousness, imbued with infinite potential. You are existence itself.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: The existence of conscious minds and their access to the evident truth of ethics and methematics are among the data that a theory of the world and our place in it has yet to explain.
author: Thomas Nagel

quote: First we have to understand that we are not the mind! We are identical with neither its bright, nor its dark side!
author: Frank M. Wanderer

quote: The world we see is a painting colored by our fears and desires.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: How freeing of a thought: instead of worrying about leaving a legacy, to leave no trace of one's existence. How liberating indeed!
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Yes, there is an outside world, and yes, there is an objective reality, but in moving through this world, we constantly apply unconscious filter mechanisms, and in doing so, we unknowingly construct our own individual world, which is our "reality tunnel.
author: Thomas Metzinger

quote: If you compose your dreams into a music, then your dreams will become the music you will always love to sing.
author: Auliq-Ice

quote: If you do not completely accept yourself, you can not love yourself fully. It would be hard to love anything unconditionally.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: Preparing for partnership is a process the male must want to go through. Sometimes there are life experiences that can trigger the desire to transcend his lower nature into a higher existence.
author: Shalom Melchizedek

quote: An aware mind absent of thought is not thoughtlessness; it’s alert awareness.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: The language of light can only be decoded by the heart. Truth can only be seen by those with truth in them.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: By changing the state of awareness, we can change the state of consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Through Neurotheology, I and my fellow scientists of twenty-first century have already taken the first step from the side of Science, to diminish the gap between Science and Religion. Now it is time for Religion to do the same.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: The language of light can only be decoded by the heart.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: We are the cosmos made conscious and life is the means by which the universe understands itself.
author: Brian Cox

quote: What super powers are hiding behind your insanities?
author: Susanna Mittermaier

quote: You can’t use your mind to understand your own mind.
author: L.A. Golding

quote: If you could blow the brain up to the size of a mill and walk about inside, you would not find consciousness.
author: Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz

quote: Sky-bound was the mind, Earth-bound the body rests
author: Johannes Kepler

quote: The odds are stacked against us until we realize: We make the odds.
author: Tehya Sky

quote: Consciousness set goal independently, achieves them through will and evaluation of results
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Through our chanting we merge our personal consciousness momentarily with the infinite consciousness that is our origin and our destiny. It is the drop of water finding its way back into the ocean from which it came.
author: Victor Shamas

quote: A solicitor had looked up at the sky, swept blue by the wind, and had a sudden sense of religious consolation, a feeling that this life cannot possibly be all, and that it is not possible for consciousness to end with the end of life.
author: John Lanchester

quote: Success is to wake up each morning and consciously decide that today will be the best day of your life.
author: Ken Poirot

quote: Bravery is listening even when you don't want to hear it.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: The vision teller tells the vision to unguarded minds' of prey. The programmed.
author: T.F. Hodge

quote: There is no reason good enough for us to ever be out of alignment with Peace, and there is no reason good enough for us to ever be out of alignment with Love.
author: Alaric Hutchinson

quote: In order to achieve a higher consciousness, one must get lost in love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Education is the manifestation and evolution of the knowledge that is already inherent within you.
author: Abhijit Naskar

quote: You cannot be afraid to change your pivot whenyour gut, or inner knowing, tells you to make a change. It is the illusion of fear or inability to adapt to change that prevents us from moving forward.
author: Victoria L. White

quote: The difficulties and challenges in your life are the lessons you need to learn to grow and development.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: You who are sitting before me have the power to change my consciousness into painting, poem, melody or anything else!
author: Suman Pokhrel

quote: Most people, solidly frozen into long-held, common notions, are unable to grasp clearer views.
author: Thomas Daniel Nehrer

quote: Everything exists as information in a field of infinite possibilities, and it is our Consciousness that renders the information and causes it to appear as the material world.
author: Joseph P. Kauffman

quote: It doesn’t matter whether you are looking for a reason to be happy or sad, you will always find it.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: No matter how different one looks or may seem, all are just shades in the colorful rainbow of life that loves everyone, no matter if they are short, purple, or green.
author: Jennifer Sodini

quote: The portable animal statuettes were therefore far more than decorative trinkets: they were reified three-dimensional spirit animals with all their prophylactic and other powers.
author: James David Lewis-Williams

quote: Consciousness reigns but doesn't govern.
author: Paul Valéry

quote: To achieve a higher consciousness, fill your heart with love and forget to judge, compete, or compare.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Remember that "seeing is believing" puts the cart before the horse. Art is the concrete artifact of faith and expectation, the realization of a world that would otherwise be little more than a veil of pointless consciousness stretched over a gulf of mystery.
author: Stephen King

quote: Satisfaction doesn't come from needs and desires or fulfilling them, it comes from being yourself, being true.
author: Tony Samara

quote: My dream is to create something so beautiful that it encourages people to present the best version of themselves to me everywhere I go.
author: Ross Caligiuri

quote: When we choose to operate on the frequency of compassion and kindness, we create, and reinforce our own realities, as filled with compassion and kindness.
author: Raphael Zernoff

quote: Magick is the manipulation of the Laws of Cause-and-Effect in accordance with one's Will, via states of Higher Consciousness.
author: J.Adam Snyder

quote: Use your resources wisely and spend quality time on developing your resources
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Universal or quantum consciousness emphasizes that we are all interrelated, interconnected and interdependent.
author: Gian Kumar

quote: But to pay attention is to love everything.
author: Sarah Manguso

quote: I become that what I am experiencing; consciously speaking. How do we put something like this into words?
author: Steve Leasock

quote: Individuality is but another act of segregation. We need instead learn the process of Individuation. One is to know thyself merely to be a single brick within the wall of mass creation and group consciousness.
author: Tyler J. Hebert
